GR14ruphbr_u:9: tasya hareḥ pada-kamalaṃ vande caitanya-devasya || RBhrs_1,1.2 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:15: sphuratu sanātana suciraṃ tava bhakti-rasāmṛtāmbhodhiḥ || RBhrs_1,1.5 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:17: ajñenāpi mayāsya kriyate suhṛdām pramodāya || RBhrs_1,1.6 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:19: catvārah khalu vakṣyante bhāgāḥ pūrvādayaḥ kramāt || RBhrs_1,1.7 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:23: bhāvāśritā tṛtīyā ca turyā prema-nirūpikā || RBhrs_1,1.9 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:24: tatrādau suṣṭhu vaiśiṣṭyam asyāḥ kathayituṃ sphuṭam |
GR14ruphbr_u:25: lakṣaṇaṃ kriyate bhakter uttamāyāḥ satāṃ matam || RBhrs_1,1.10 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:32: ahaituky avyavahitā yā bhaktiḥ puruṣottame || RBhrs_1,1.13 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:34: dīyamānaṃ na gṛhṇanti vinā mat-sevanaṃ janāḥ || RBhrs_1,1.14 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:35: sa eva bhakti-yogākhya ātyantika udāhṛtaḥ || RBhrs_1,1.15 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:41: kleśās tu pāpaṃ tad-bījam avidyā ceti te tridhā || RBhrs_1,1.18 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:43: aprārabdhaṃ bhavet pāpaṃ prārabdhaṃ ceti tad dvidhā || RBhrs_1,1.19 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:51: kutaḥ punas te bhagavan nu darśanāt || RBhrs_1,1.21 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:53: durjāty-ārambhakaṃ pāpaṃ yat syāt prārabdham eva tat || RBhrs_1,1.22 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:64: sroto-gaṇās tam araṇaṃ bhaja vāsudevam || RBhrs_1,1.25 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:67: avidyāṃ nirdahaty āśu dāva-jvāleva pannagīm || RBhrs_1,1.26 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:70: sadguṇāḥ sukham ity-ādīny ākhyātāni manīṣibhiḥ || RBhrs_1,1.27 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:72: yenārcito haris tena tarpitāni jaganty api |
GR14ruphbr_u:73: rajyanti jantavas tatra jangamāḥ sthāvarā api || RBhrs_1,1.28 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:75: yasyāsti bhaktir bhagavaty akiñcanā sarvair guṇais tatra samāsate surāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:79: sukhaṃ vaiṣayikaṃ brāhmam aiśvaraṃ ceti tat tridhā || RBhrs_1,1.30 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:81: siddhayaḥ paramāścaryā bhuktir muktiś ca śāśvatī |
GR14ruphbr_u:82: nityaṃ ca paramānando bhaved govinda-bhaktitaḥ || RBhrs_1,1.31 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:84: bhūyo 'pi yāce deveśa tvayi bhaktir dṛḍhāstu me |
GR14ruphbr_u:85: yā mokṣānta-caturvarga phaladā sukhadā latā || RBhrs_1,1.32 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:88: puruṣārthās tu catvārās tṛṇāyante samantataḥ || RBhrs_1,1.33 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:91: bhuktyaś cādbhutās tasyāś ceṭikāvad anuvratāḥ || RBhrs_1,1.34 || iti |
GR14ruphbr_u:94: hariṇā cāśvadeyeti dvidhā sā syāt sudurlabhā || RBhrs_1,1.35 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:99: rājan patir gurur alaṃ bhavatāṃ yadūnāṃ daivaṃ priyaḥ kula-patiḥ kva ca kiṅkaro vaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:100: astv evam aṅga bhajatāṃ bhagavān mukundo muktiṃ dadāti karhicit sma na bhakti-yogam || RBhrs_1,1.37
GR14ruphbr_u:106: sukhāni goṣpadāyante brāhmāṇy api jagad-guro || RBhrs_1,1.39 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:109: kurvanti kṛtinaḥ kecit catur-vargaṃ tṛṇopamam || RBhrs_1,1.40 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:114: na sādhyati mām yogo na sāṅkhyaṃ dharma uddhava |
GR14ruphbr_u:115: na svādhyāyas tapas tyāgo yathā bhaktir mamorjitā || RBhrs_1,1.42 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:119: yeṣāṃ gṛhān āvasatīti sākṣād guḍhaṃ paraṃ brahma manuṣya-liṅgam || RBhrs_1,1.43 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:121: dviśaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ padair etan māhātyaṃ parikīrtitam || RBhrs_1,1.44 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:124: yuktis tu kevalā naiva yad asyā apratiṣṭhatā || RBhrs_1,1.45 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:131: sā bhaktiḥ sādhanaṃ bhāvaḥ premā ceti tridhoditā || RBhrs_1,2.1 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:134: nitya-siddhasya bhāvasya prākaṭyaṃ hṛdi sādhyatā || RBhrs_1,2.2 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:135: sā bhaktiḥ saptama-skandhe bhaṅgyā devarṣiṇoditā || RBhrs_1,2.3 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:137: tasmāt kenāpy upāyena manaḥ kṛṣṇe niveśayet || RBhrs_1,2.4 || iti |
GR14ruphbr_u:138: vaidhī rāgānugā ceti sā dvidhā sādhanābhidhā || RBhrs_1,2.5 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:141: śāsanenaiva śāstrasya sā vaidhī bhaktir ucyate || RBhrs_1,2.6 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:143: tasmād bhārata sarvātmā bhagavān īśvaro hariḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:144: śrotavyaḥ kīrtitavyaś ca smartavyaś cecchatābhayam || RBhrs_1,2.7 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:146: smartavyaḥ satataṃ viṣṇur vismartavyo na jātucit |
GR14ruphbr_u:147: sarve vidhi-niṣedhāḥ syur etayor eva kiṅkarāḥ || RBhrs_1,2.8 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:148: ity asau syād vidhir nityaḥ sarva-varṇāśramādiṣu |
GR14ruphbr_u:152: catvāro jajñire varṇā guṇair viprādayaḥ pṛthak || RBhrs_1,2.10 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:153: ya eṣāṃ puruṣaṃ sākṣād ātma-prabhavam īśvaram |
GR14ruphbr_u:154: na bhajanty avajānanti sthānād bhraṣṭāḥ patanty adhaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.11 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:157: arcann ubhyataḥ siddhiṃ matto vindaty abhīpsitām || RBhrs_1,2.12 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:159: surarṣe vihitā śāstre harim uddiśya yā kriyā |
GR14ruphbr_u:160: saiva bhaktir iti proktā tayā bhaktiḥ parā bhavet || RBhrs_1,2.13 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:163: nātisakto na vairāgya-bhāg asyām adhikāry asau || RBhrs_1,2.14 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:166: na nirviṇṇo nātisakto bhakti-yogo 'sya siddhidaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.15 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:167: uttamo madhyamaś ca syāt kaniṣṭhaś ceti sa tridhā || RBhrs_1,2.16 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:169: śāstre yuktau ca nipuṇaḥ sarvathā dṛḍha-niścayaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:170: prauḍha-śraddho 'dhikārī yaḥ sa bhaktāv uttamo mataḥ || RBhrs_1,2.17 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:172: yaḥ śāstrādiṣv anipuṇaḥ śraddhāvān sa tu madhyamaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.18 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:174: yo bhavet komala-śraddhaḥ sa kaniṣṭho nigadyate || RBhrs_1,2.19 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:176: madhye yasmin bhagavatah kṛpā syāt tat-priyasya vā || RBhrs_1,2.20 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:178: yathebhaḥ śaunakādiś ca dhruvaḥ sa ca catuḥsanaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.21 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:180: tāvad bhakti-sukhasyātra katham abhyudayo bhavet || RBhrs_1,2.22 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:181: tatrāpi ca viśeṣeṇa gatim aṇvīm anicchataḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:182: bhaktir hṛta-manaḥ-prāṇān premṇā tān kurute janān || RBhrs_1,2.23 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:186: hṛtātmano hṛta-prāṇāṃś ca bhaktir anicchato me gatim aṇvīṃ prayuṅkte || RBhrs_1,2.24 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:188: eṣāṃ mokṣāya bhaktānāṃ na kadācit spṛhā bhavet || RBhrs_1,2.25 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:197: ye 'nyonyato bhāgavatāḥ prasajya sabhājayante mama pauruṣāṇi || RBhrs_1,2.27 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:200: dīyamānaṃ na gṛhṇanti vinā mat-sevanaṃ janāḥ || RBhrs_1,2.28 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:204: sā brahmaṇi sva-mahimany api nātha mā bhūt kiṃ tv antakāsi-lulitāt patatāṃ vimānāt || RBhrs_1,2.29
GR14ruphbr_u:206: na kāmaye nātha tad apy ahaṃ kvacin na yatra yuṣmac-caraṇāmbujāsavaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:208: vidhatsva karṇāyutam eṣa me varaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.30 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:217: na yoga-siddhīr apunar-bhavaṃ vā samañjasa tvā virahayya kāṅkṣe || RBhrs_1,2.32 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:223: ye tu necchanty api paraṃ te svārtha-kuśalāḥ smṛtāḥ || RBhrs_1,2.34 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:225: tuṣṭe ca tatra kim alabhyam ananta ādye kiṃ tair guṇa-vyatikarād iha ye sva-siddhāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:226: dharmādayaḥ kim aguṇena ca kāṅkṣitena sāraṃ juṣāṃ caraṇayor upagāyatāṃ naḥ || RBhrs_1,2.35
GR14ruphbr_u:228: pratyānītāḥ parama bhavatā trāyatā naḥ sva-bhāgā
GR14ruphbr_u:230: kāla-grastaṃ kiyad idam aho nātha śuśrūṣatāṃ te
GR14ruphbr_u:231: muktis teṣāṃ na hi bahumatā nārasiṃhāparaiḥ kim || RBhrs_1,2.36 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:233: ekāntino yasya na kañcanārthaṃ vāñchanti ye vai bhagavat-prapannāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:234: aty-adbhutaṃ tac-caritaṃ sumaṅgalaṃ gāyanta ānanda-samudra-magnāḥ || RBhrs_1,2.37 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:237: necchanti sevayā pūrṇāḥ kuto 'nyat kāla-viplutam || RBhrs_1,2.38 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:241: na yoga-siddhīr apunar-bhavaṃ vā vāñchanti yat-pāda-rajaḥ-prapannāḥ || RBhrs_1,2.39 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:245: na parilaṣanti kecid apavargam apīśvara te
GR14ruphbr_u:248: na kiñcit sādhavo dhīrā bhaktā hy ekāntino mama |
GR14ruphbr_u:249: vāñchanty api mayā dattaṃ kaivalyam apunar-bhavam || RBhrs_1,2.41 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:253: na yoga-siddhīr apunar-bhavaṃ vā mayy arpitātmecchati mad vinānyat || RBhrs_1,2.42 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:255: naivecchaty āśiṣaḥ kvāpi brahmarṣir mokṣam apy uta |
GR14ruphbr_u:256: bhaktiṃ parāṃ bhagavati labdhavān puruṣe 'vyaye || RBhrs_1,2.43 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:258: varaṃ deva mokṣaṃ na mokṣāvadhiṃ vā na cānyaṃ vṛṇe 'haṃ vareśād apīha |
GR14ruphbr_u:260: sadā me manasy avirāstāṃ kim anyaiḥ || RBhrs_1,2.44 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:261: kuverātmajau baddha-mūrtyaiva yadvat tvayā mocitau bhakti-baddhau kṛtau ca |
GR14ruphbr_u:263: na mokṣe graho me 'sti dāmodareha || RBhrs_1,2.45 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:265: na dharma kāmam arthaṃ vā mokṣaṃ vā varadeśvara |
GR14ruphbr_u:266: prārthaye tava pādābje dāsyam evābhikāmaye || RBhrs_1,2.46 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:268: punaḥ punar varān ditsur viṣṇur muktiṃ na yācitaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:269: bhaktir eva vṛtā yena prahlādaṃ taṃ namāmy ahaṃ || RBhrs_1,2.47 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:270: yadṛcchayā labdham api viṣṇor dāśarathes tu yaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:271: naicchan mokṣaṃ vinā dāsyaṃ tasmai hanumate namaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.48 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:274: bhavān prabhur ahaṃ dāsa iti yatra vilupyate || RBhrs_1,2.49 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:279: icchāmi hi mahābhāga kāruṇyaṃ tava suvrata || RBhrs_1,2.51 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:282: sudurlabhaḥ praśāntātmā koṭiṣv api mahā-mune || RBhrs_1,2.52 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:285: bhakti-yoga-vidhānārthaṃ kathaṃ paśyema hi striyaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.53 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:287: ātmārāmāś ca munayo nirgranthā apy urukrame |
GR14ruphbr_u:288: kurvanty ahaitukīṃ bhaktim ittham-bhūta-guṇo hariḥ || RBhrs_1,2.54 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:290: sālokyādis tathāpy atra bhaktyā nātivirudhyate || RBhrs_1,2.55 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:292: sālokyādir dvidhā tatra nādyā sevā-juṣaṃ matā || RBhrs_1,2.56 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:294: naivāṅgīkurvate jātu muktiṃ pañca-vidhām api || RBhrs_1,2.57 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:296: yeṣāṃ śrīśa-prasādo 'pi mano hartuṃ na śaknuyāt || RBhrs_1,2.58 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:301: dṛṣtāntitā vaśiṣṭhena hari-bhaktir nṛpaṃ prati || RBhrs_1,2.60 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:303: sarve 'dhikāriṇo hy atra hari-bhaktau yathā nṛpa || RBhrs_1,2.61 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:306: samprāpya vaiṣṇavīṃ dīkṣāṃ dīkṣitā iva sambabhuḥ || RBhrs_1,2.62 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:309: na karmaṇām akaraṇād eṣa bhakty-adhikāriṇām || RBhrs_1,2.63 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:311: iti vaiṣṇava-śāstrāṇāṃ rahasyaṃ tad-vidāṃ matam || RBhrs_1,2.64 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:313: sve sve 'dhikāre yā niṣṭhā sā guṇaḥ parikīrtitaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:314: viparyayas tu doṣaḥ syād ubhayor eṣa niścayaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.65 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:316: tyaktvā svadharmaṃ caraṇāmbujam harer bhajann apakvo 'tha patet tato yadi |
GR14ruphbr_u:317: yatra kva vābhadram abhūd amuṣya kiṃ ko vārtha āpto 'bhajatāṃ sva-dharmataḥ || RBhrs_1,2.66
GR14ruphbr_u:319: ājñāyaiva guṇān doṣān mayādiṣṭān api svakān |
GR14ruphbr_u:320: dharmān santyajya yaḥ sarvān māṃ bhajet sa ca sattamaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.67 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:322: devarṣi-bhūtāpta-nṝṇāṃ pitṝṇāṃ na kiṅkaro nāyam ṛṇī ca rājan |
GR14ruphbr_u:323: sarvātmanā yaḥ śaraṇaṃ śaraṇyaṃ gato mukundaṃ parihṛtya kartam || RBhrs_1,2.68 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:325: sarva-dharman parityājya mām ekaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja |
GR14ruphbr_u:326: ahaṃ tvāṃ sarva-pāpebhyo mokṣayiṣyāmi mā sucaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.69 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:329: tathā na spṛśato rāmopāsakaṃ vidhi-pūrvakam || RBhrs_1,2.70 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:331: svapāda-mulaṃ bhajataḥ priyasya tyaktāny abhāvasya hariḥ pareśaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:332: vikarma yac cotpatitaṃ kathañcid dhunoti sarvaṃ hṛdi sanniviṣṭaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.71 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:334: kintu tāni prasiddhāni nirdiśyante yathāmati || RBhrs_1,2.72 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:337: ekaṃ karmātra vidvadbhir ekaṃ bhakty-aṅgam ucyate || RBhrs_1,2.73 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:342: nivāso dvārakādau ca gaṅgāder api sannidhau || RBhrs_1,2.75 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:345: eṣām atra daśāṅgānāṃ bhavet prārambha-rupatā || RBhrs_1,2.77 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:357: nirmālyādeś ca tasyāgre tāṇḍavaṃ daṇḍavan-natiḥ || RBhrs_1,2.84 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:359: arcanaṃ paricaryā ca gītaṃ saṅkīrtanaṃ japaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.85 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:363: smṛtir dhyānaṃ tathā dāsyaṃ sakhyam ātma-nivedanam || RBhrs_1,2.87 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:365: sarvathā śaraṇāpattis tadīyānāṃ ca sevanam || RBhrs_1,2.88 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:369: śraddhā viśeṣataḥ prītiḥ śrī-mūrter aṅghri-sevane || RBhrs_1,2.90 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:371: sajātīyāśaye snigdhe sādhau saṅgaḥ svato vare || RBhrs_1,2.91 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:374: nikhila-śraiṣṭhya-bodhāya punar apy atra kīrtanam || RBhrs_1,2.93 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:379: tasmād guruṃ prapadyeta jijñāsuḥ śreya uttamam |
GR14ruphbr_u:380: śābde pare ca niṣṇātaṃ brahmaṇy upaśamāśrayam || RBhrs_1,2.97 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:383: amāyayānuvṛttyā yais tuṣyed ātmātma-do hariḥ || RBhrs_1,2.98 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:388: sa mṛgyaḥ śreyasāṃ hetuḥ panthāḥ santāpa-varjitaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:389: anvāpta-śramaṃ pūrve yena santaḥ pratasthire || RBhrs_1,2.100 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:392: aikāntikī harer bhaktir utpātāyaiva kalpate || RBhrs_1,2.101 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:394: vastutas tu tathā naiva yad aśāstrīyatekṣyate || RBhrs_1,2.102 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:396: acirād eva sarvārthaḥ sidhyaty eṣām abhīpsitaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:399: harim uddiśya bhogāni kāle tyaktavatas tava |
GR14ruphbr_u:402: saṃvatsaraṃ vā ṣaṇmāsān māsaṃ māsārdham eva vā |
GR14ruphbr_u:403: dvārakā-vāsinaḥ sarve narā nāryaś caturbhujāḥ || RBhrs_1,2.105 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:406: diviṣṭhā yatra paśyanti sarvān eva caturbhujān || RBhrs_1,2.106 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:410: punāti seśān ubhayatra lokān kas tāṃ na seveta mariṣyamāṇaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.107 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:412: yāvatā syāt sva-nirvāhaḥ svīkuryāt tāvad artha-vit |
GR14ruphbr_u:413: ādhikye nyūnatāyāṃ ca cyavate paramārthataḥ || RBhrs_1,2.108 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:419: pūjitāḥ praṇatāḥ dhyātāḥ kṣapayanti nṝṇām agham || RBhrs_1,2.110 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:427: na śiṣyān anubadhnīta granthān naivābhyased bahūn |
GR14ruphbr_u:428: na vyākhyām upayuñjīta nārambhān ārabhet kvacit || RBhrs_1,2.113 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:431: aviklava-matir bhūtvā harim eva dhiyā smaret || RBhrs_1,2.114 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:434: kathaṃ tatra mukundasya sphūrti-sambhāvanā bhavet || RBhrs_1,2.115 |||
GR14ruphbr_u:439: piteva putraṃ karuṇo nodvejayati yo janam |
GR14ruphbr_u:440: viśuddhasya hṛṣīkeśas tūrṇaṃ tasya prasīdati || RBhrs_1,2.117 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:443: vaiṣṇavena sadā te tu varjanīyāḥ prayatnataḥ || RBhrs_1,2.118 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:446: harer apy aparādhān yaḥ kuryād dvipadapāṃśulaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.119 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:447: nāmāśrayaḥ kadācit syāt taraty eva sa nāmataḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:448: nāmno hi sarva-suhṛdo hy aparādhāt pataty adhaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.120 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:450: nindāṃ bhagavataḥ śrṇvaṃs tat-parasya janasya vā |

GR14ruphbr_u:856: hari-bhaktau pravṛttā ye na te syuḥ para-tāpinaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.262 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:863: śrī viṣṇoḥ śravaṇe parīkṣid abhavad vaiyāsakiḥ kīrtane prahlādaḥ smaraṇe tad-aṅghri-bhajane lakṣmīḥ pṛthuḥ pūjane |
GR14ruphbr_u:864: akrūras tv abhivandane kapi-patir dāsye 'tha sakhye 'rjunaḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:865: sarvasvātma-nivedane balir abhūt kṛṣṇāptir eṣāṃ parā || RBhrs_1,2.265 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:877: kāmaṃ ca dāsye na tu kāma-kāmyayā
GR14ruphbr_u:880: vaidhi bhaktir iyaṃ kaiścan maryādā-mārga ucyate || RBhrs_1,2.269 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:883: rāgātmikām anusṛtā yā sā rāgānugocyate || RBhrs_1,2.270 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:886: tan-mayī yā bhaved bhaktiḥ sātra rāgātmikoditā || RBhrs_1,2.272 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:887: sā kāmarūpā sambandha-rūpā ceti bhaved dvidhā || RBhrs_1,2.273 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:889: kāmād dveṣād bhayāt snehād yathā bhaktyeśvare manaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:890: āveśya tad aghaṃ hitvā bahavas tad-gatiṃ gatāḥ || RBhrs_1,2.274 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:891: gopyaḥ kāmād bhayāt kaṃso dveṣāc caidyādayo nṛpāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:892: sambandhād vṛṣṇayaḥ snehād yūyaṃ bhaktyā vayaṃ vibho || RBhrs_1,2.275 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:897: bhaktyā vayam iti vyaktaṃ vaidhī bhaktir udīritā || RBhrs_1,2.277 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:898: yad-arīṇāṃ priyāṇāṃ ca prāpyam ekam ivoditam |
GR14ruphbr_u:900: brahmaṇy eva layaṃ yānti prāyeṇa ripavo hareḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:901: kecit prāpyāpi sārūpyābhāsaṃ majjanti tat-sukhe || RBhrs_1,2.279 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:903: siddha-lokas tu tamasaḥ pāre yatra vasanti hi |
GR14ruphbr_u:904: siddhā brahma-sukhe magnā daityāś ca hariṇa hatāḥ || RBhrs_1,2.280 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:905: rāga-bandhena kenāpi taṃ bhajanto vrajanty amī |
GR14ruphbr_u:906: aṅghri-padma-sudhāḥ prema-rūpās tasya priyā janāḥ || RBhrs_1,2.281 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:908: nibhṛta-marun-mano 'kṣa-dṛḍha-yoga-yujo hṛdi yan munaya upāsate tad-arayo 'pi yayuḥ smaraṇāt
GR14ruphbr_u:910: vayam api te samāḥ sama-dṛśo 'ṅghri-saroja-sudhāḥ || RBhrs_1,2.282 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:912: sā kāmarūpā sambhoga-tṛṣṇāṃ yā nayati svatām |
GR14ruphbr_u:913: yad asyāṃ kṛṣṇa-saukhyārtham eva kevalam udyamaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.283 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:915: āsāṃ prema-viśeṣo 'yaṃ prāptaḥ kām api mādhurīṃ |
GR14ruphbr_u:916: tat-tat-krīḍā-nidānatvāt kāma ity ucyate budhaiḥ || RBhrs_1,2.284 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:918: premaiva gopa-rāmāṇāṃ kāma ity agamat prathām || RBhrs_1,2.285 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:919: ity uddhavādayo 'py etaṃ vāñchati bhagavat-priyāḥ || RBhrs_1,2.286 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:920: kāma-prāyā ratiḥ kintu kubjāyām eva sammatā || RBhrs_1,2.287 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:927: rāgātmikāyā dvaividhyād dvidhā rāgānugā ca sā |
GR14ruphbr_u:928: kāmānugā ca sambandhānugā ceti nigadyate || RBhrs_1,2.290 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:931: teṣāṃ bhāvāptaye lubdho bhaved atrādhikāravān || RBhrs_1,2.291 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:933: nātra śāstraṃ na yuktiṃ ca tal-lobhotpatti-lakṣaṇam || RBhrs_1,2.292 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:935: atra śāstraṃ tathā tarkam anukūlam apekṣate || RBhrs_1,2.293 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:936: kṛṣṇaṃ smaran janaṃ cāsya preṣṭhaṃ nija-samīhitam |
GR14ruphbr_u:937: tat-tat-kathā-rataś cāsau kuryād vāsaṃ vraje sadā || RBhrs_1,2.294 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:941: yāny aṅgāni ca tāny atra vijñeyāni manīṣibhiḥ || RBhrs_1,2.296 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:947: śrī-mūrter mādhurīṃ prekṣya tat-tal-līlāṃ niśamya vā |
GR14ruphbr_u:949: purāṇe śruyate pādme puṃsam api bhaved iyam || RBhrs_1,2.300 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:952: dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ hariṃ tatra bhoktum aicchan suvigraham || RBhrs_1,2.301 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:953: te sarve strītvam āpannāḥ samudbhūtāś ca gokule |
GR14ruphbr_u:954: hariṃ samprāpya kāmena tato muktā bhavārṇavāt || RBhrs_1,2.302 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:955: riraṃsāṃ suṣṭhu kurvan yo vidhi-mārgeṇa sevate |
GR14ruphbr_u:956: kevalenaiva sa tadā mahiṣītvam iyāt pure || RBhrs_1,2.303 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:959: bhartāraṃ ca jagad-yoniṃ vāsudevam ajaṃ vibhum || RBhrs_1,2.304 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:961: sā sambandhānugā bhaktiḥ procyate sadbhir ātmani |
GR14ruphbr_u:965: tathā hi śruyate śāstre kaścit kurupurī-sthitaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:970: ye dhyāyanti sadodyuktās tebhyo 'pīha namo namaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.308 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:977: rucibhiś citta-māsṛṇya-kṛd asau bhāva ucyate || RBhrs_1,3.1 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:979: premṇas tu prathamāvasthā bhāva ity abhidhīyate |
GR14ruphbr_u:986: vastutaḥ svayam āsvāda-svarūpaiva ratis tv asau |
GR14ruphbr_u:990: ādyas tu prāyikas tatra dvitīyo viralodayaḥ || RBhrs_1,3.6 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:995: harāv āsaktim utpādya ratiṃ saṃjanayaty asau || RBhrs_1,3.8 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:999: priya-śravasy aṅga mamābhavad ratiḥ || RBhrs_1,3.9 || iti |
GR14ruphbr_u:1000: ratyā tu bhāva evātra na tu premābhidhīyate |
GR14ruphbr_u:1001: mama bhaktiḥ pravṛtteti vakṣyate sa yad agrataḥ || RBhrs_1,3.10 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1003: itthaṃ śarat-prāvṛṣikāv ṛtū harer viśṛṇvato me 'nusavaṃ yaśo 'malam |
GR14ruphbr_u:1004: saṅkīrtyamānaṃ munibhir mahātmabhir bhaktiḥ pravṛttātma rajas-tamopahā || RBhrs_1,3.11 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1010: purāṇe nātya-śāstre ca dvayos tu rati-bhāvayoḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:1011: samānārthatayā hy atra dvayam aikyena lakṣitam || RBhrs_1,3.13 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1013: itthaṃ manorathaṃ bālā kurvatī nṛtya utsukā |
GR14ruphbr_u:1014: hari-prītyā ca tāṃ sarvāṃ rātrim evātyavāhayat || RBhrs_1,3.14 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1022: dvijendra tava mayy astu bhaktir avyābhicāriṇī || RBhrs_1,3.17 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1027: prasāda āntaro yaḥ syāt sa hārda iti kathyate || RBhrs_1,3.19 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1032: guṇair alam asaṅkhyeyair mahātmyaṃ tasya sūcyate |
GR14ruphbr_u:1033: vāsudeve bhagavati yasya naisargikī ratiḥ || RBhrs_1,3.21 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1035: nisargaḥ saiva tenātra ratir naisargikī matā || RBhrs_1,3.22 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1037: aho dhanyo 'si devarṣe kṛpayā yasya tat-kṣaṇāt |
GR14ruphbr_u:1038: nīco 'py utpulako lebhe lubdhako ratim acyute || RBhrs_1,3.23 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1039: bhaktānāṃ bhedataḥ seyaṃ ratiḥ pañca-vidhā matā |
GR14ruphbr_u:1040: agre vivicya vaktavyā tena nātra prapañcyate || RBhrs_1,3.24 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1042: āśā-bandhaḥ samutkaṇṭhā nāma-gāne sadā ruciḥ || RBhrs_1,3.25 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1044: ity ādayo 'nubhāvāḥ syur jāta-bhāvāṅkure jane || RBhrs_1,3.26 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1046: kṣobha-hetāv api prāpte kṣāntir akṣubhitātmatā || RBhrs_1,3.27 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1048: taṃ mopayātaṃ pratiyantu viprā gaṅgā ca devī dhṛta-cittam īśe |
GR14ruphbr_u:1049: dvijopasṛṣṭaḥ kuhakas takṣako vā daśatv alaṃ gāyata viṣṇu-gāthāḥ || RBhrs_1,3.28 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1051: vāgbhiḥ stuvanto manasā smarantas tanvā namanto 'py aniśaṃ na tṛptāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:1052: bhaktāḥ sravan-netra-jalāḥ samagram āyur harer eva samarpayanti || RBhrs_1,3.29 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1054: viraktir indriyārthānāṃ syād arocakatā svayaṃ || RBhrs_1,3.30 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1056: yo dustyajān dāra-sutān suhṛd rājyaṃ hṛdi-spṛśaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:1061: harau ratiṃ vahann eṣa narendrāṇāṃ śikhā-maṇiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:1062: bhikṣām aṭann ari-pure śvapākam api vandate || RBhrs_1,3.33 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1066: na premā śravaṇādi-bhaktir api vā yogo 'thavā vaiṣṇavo jñānaṃ vā śubha-karma vā kiyad aho saj-jātir apy asti vā |
GR14ruphbr_u:1067: hīnārthādhika-sādhake tvayi tathāpy acchedya-mūlā satī he gopī-jana-vallabha vyathayate hā hā mad-āśaiva mām || RBhrs_1,3.35 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1072: ālolām anurāgiṇor nayanayor ārdrāṃ mṛdau jalpite |
GR14ruphbr_u:1074: āśāste mama locanaṃ vraja-śiśor-mūrtiṃ jagan-mohinīm || RBhrs_1,3.37 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1077: tava madhura-svara-kaṇṭhī gāyati nāmāvalīṃ bālā || RBhrs_1,3.38 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1079: mādhuryād api madhuraṃ manmathatā tasya kim api kaiśoram |
GR14ruphbr_u:1080: capalyād api capalaṃ ceto bata harati hanta kiṃ kurmaḥ || RBhrs_1,3.39 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1081: tad vasati-sthale prītiḥ, yathā padyāvalyām {*Not found in my edition.}--
GR14ruphbr_u:1082: atrāsīt kila nanda-sadma śakaṭasyātrābhavad bhañjanaṃ bandha-ccheda-karo 'pi dāmabhir abhūd baddho 'tra dāmodaraḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:1084: ānandāśru-dharaḥ kadā madhu-purīṃ dhanyaś cariṣyāmy aham || RBhrs_1,3.40
GR14ruphbr_u:1087: mumukṣu-prabhṛtīnāṃ ced bhaved eṣā ratir na hi || RBhrs_1,3.41 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1089: yā kṛṣṇenātigopyāśu bhajadbhyo 'pi na dīyate || RBhrs_1,3.42 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1091: hṛdaye sambhavaty eṣāṃ kathaṃ bhāgavatī ratiḥ || RBhrs_1,3.43 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1094: pratibimbas tathā cchāyā raty-ābhāso dvidhā mataḥ || RBhrs_1,3.45 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1104: rateś chāyā bhavet kiṃcit tat-sādṛśyāvalambinī || RBhrs_1,3.49 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1106: apy ānuṣaṅgikād eṣa kvacid ajñeṣv apīkṣyate || RBhrs_1,3.50 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1107: kintu bhāgyaṃ vinā nāsau bhāva-cchāyāpy udañcati |
GR14ruphbr_u:1108: yad abhyudayataḥ kṣemaṃ tatra syād uttarottaram || RBhrs_1,3.51 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1112: krameṇa kṣayam āpnoti kha-sthaḥ pūrṇa-śaśī yathā || RBhrs_1,3.53 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1115: ābhāsatāṃ ca śanakair nyūna-jātīyatām api || RBhrs_1,3.54 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1117: ābhāsatām asau kiṃ vā bhajanīyeśa-bhāvatām || RBhrs_1,3.55 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1118: ata eva kvacit teṣu navya-bhakteṣu dṛśyate |
GR14ruphbr_u:1120: sādhanekṣāṃ vinā yasminn akasmād bhāva īkṣyate |
GR14ruphbr_u:1123: yaḥ prathīyān bhaved bhāvaḥ sa tu kṛṣṇa-prasādajaḥ || RBhrs_1,3.58 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1124: jane cej jāta-bhāve 'pi vaiguṇyam iva dṛśyate |
GR14ruphbr_u:1125: kāryā tathāpi nāsūyā kṛtārthaḥ sarvathaiva saḥ || RBhrs_1,3.59 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1132: uṣmāṇam api vamantī sudhāṃśu-koṭer api svādvī || RBhrs_1,3.61 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1137: bhāvaḥ sa eva sāndrātmā budhaiḥ premā nigadyate || RBhrs_1,4.1 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1141: bhaktiḥ premocyate bhīṣma-mukhyair yatra tu saṅgatā |
GR14ruphbr_u:1143: bhāvottho 'ti-prasādotthaḥ śrī-harer iti sa dvidhā || RBhrs_1,4.4 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1150: hasaty atho roditi rauti gāyaty unmādavan nṛtyati loka-bāhyaḥ || RBhrs_1,4.6 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1152: na patiṃ kāmayet kañcid brahmacarya-sthitā sadā |
GR14ruphbr_u:1161: māhātmya-jñāna-yuktaś ca kevalaś ceti sa dvidhā || RBhrs_1,4.11 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1164: sneho bhaktir iti proktas tayā sārṣṭyādinānyathā || RBhrs_1,4.12 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1169: rāgānugāśritānāṃ tu prāyaśaḥ kevalo bhavet || RBhrs_1,4.14 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1171: tato 'nartha-nivṛttiḥ syāt tato niṣṭhā rucis tataḥ || RBhrs_1,4.15 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1173: sādhakānām ayaṃ premnaḥ prādurbhāve bhavet kramaḥ || RBhrs_1,4.16 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1175: antarvāṇībhir apy asya mudrā suṣṭhu sudurgamā || RBhrs_1,4.17 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1177: bhāvonmatto hareḥ kiñcin na veda sukham ātmanaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:1178: dukhaṃ ceti maheśāni paramānanda āplutaḥ || RBhrs_1,4.18 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1179: premṇa eva vilāsatvād vairalyāt sādhakeṣv api |
GR14ruphbr_u:1180: atra snehādayo bhedā vivicya na hi śaṃsitāḥ || RBhrs_1,4.19 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1194: agha-damano mathurāyāṃ sadā sanātana-tanur jayati || RBhrs_2,1.1 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1197: asya pañca laharyaḥ syur vibhāvākhyāgrimā matā |
GR14ruphbr_u:1199: vyabhicāry-abhidhā turyā sthāyi-saṃjñā ca pañcamī || RBhrs_2,1.3 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1204: eṣā kṛṣṇa-ratiḥ sthāyī bhāvo bhakti-raso bhavet || RBhrs_2,1.5 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1206: eṣa bhakti-rasāsvādas tasyaiva hṛdi jāyate || RBhrs_2,1.6 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1212: ratir ānanda-rūpaiva nīyamānā tu rasyatām || RBhrs_2,1.9 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1215: kintu premā vibhāvādyaiḥ svalpair nīto 'py aṇīyasīm |
GR14ruphbr_u:1216: vibhāvanādy-avasthāṃ tu sadya āsvādyatāṃ vrajet || RBhrs_2,1.11 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1219: kārya-bhūtāḥ smitādyāś ca tathāṣṭau stabdhatādayaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.12 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1220: nirvedādyāḥ sahāyāś ca te jñeyā rasa-bhāvane |
GR14ruphbr_u:1221: vibhāvā anubhāvāś ca sāttvikā vyabhicāriṇaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.13 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1224: te dvidhālambanā eke tathaivoddīpanāḥ pare || RBhrs_2,1.14 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1226: vibhāvyate hi raty-ādir yatra yena vibhāvyate |
GR14ruphbr_u:1229: kṛṣṇaś ca kṛṣṇa-bhaktāś ca budhair ālambanā matāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:1232: nāyakānāṃ śiro-ratnaṃ kṛṣṇas tu bhagavān svayam |
GR14ruphbr_u:1236: hanta me katham udeti sa-vatse, vatsa-pāla-paṭale ratir atra |
GR14ruphbr_u:1237: ity aniścita-matir baladevo, vismaya-stimita-mūrtir ivāsīt || RBhrs_2,1.18
GR14ruphbr_u:1239: āvṛtaṃ prakaṭaṃ ceti svarūpaṃ kathitaṃ dvidhā || RBhrs_2,1.19 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1243: māṃ snehayati kim uccair, mahileyaṃ dvārakāvarodhe 'tra |
GR14ruphbr_u:1244: āṃ viditaṃ kutukārthī, vanitā-veśo hariś carati || RBhrs_2,1.21 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1249: karoty uccair modaṃ mama madhura-mūrtir madhuripuḥ || RBhrs_2,1.22 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1252: ruciras tejasā yukto balīyān vayasānvitaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.23 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1257: sthiro dāntaḥ kṣamā-śīlo gambhīro dhṛtimān samaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:1258: vadānyo dhārmikaḥ śūraḥ karuṇo mānya-mānakṛt || RBhrs_2,1.26 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1264: samudrā iva pañcāśad durvigāhā harer amī || RBhrs_2,1.29 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1267: tathā hi pādme pārvatyai śiti-kaṇṭhena tad-guṇāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:1269: eta eva guṇāḥ prāyo dharmāya vana-mālinaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:1272: satyaṃ śaucaṃ dayā kṣāntis tyāgaḥ santoṣa ārjavam |
GR14ruphbr_u:1273: śamo damas tapaḥ sāmyaṃ titikṣoparatiḥ śrutam || RBhrs_2,1.33 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1274: jñānaṃ viraktir aiśvaryaṃ śauryaṃ tejo balaṃ smṛtiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:1275: svātantryaṃ kauśalaṃ kāntir dhairyaṃ mārdavam eva ca || RBhrs_2,1.34 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1276: prāgalbhyaṃ praśrayaḥ śīlaṃ saha ojo balaṃ bhagaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:1277: gāmbhīryaṃ sthairyam āstikyaṃ kīrtir māno 'nahaṅkṛtiḥ || RBhrs_2,1.35 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1278: ime cānye ca bhagavan nityā yatra mahā-guṇāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:1279: prārthyā mahattvam icchadbhir na viyanti sma karhicit || RBhrs_2,1.36 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1280: atha pañca-guṇā ye syur aṃśena giriśādiṣu || RBhrs_2,1.37 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1292: ity asādhāraṇaṃ proktaṃ govindasya catuṣṭayam || RBhrs_2,1.43 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1294: sodāharaṇam eteṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kriyate kramāt || RBhrs_2,1.44 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1296: ślāghyāṅga-sanniveśo yaḥ suramyāṅgaḥ sa kathyate || RBhrs_2,1.45 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1298: mukhaṃ candrākāraṃ karabha-nibham uru-dvayam idaṃ bhujau stambhārambhau sarasija-vareṇyaṃ kara-yugam |

GR14ruphbr_u:2155: netuḥ svarūpam evoktaṃ kaiśoram iha yadyapi |

GR14ruphbr_u:2187: āḥ kautukaṃ kalaya keli-lavād ariṣṭaṃ taṃ duṣṭa-puṅgavam asau harir unmamātha || RBhrs_2,1.345

GR14ruphbr_u:2232: aṅgair evābharaṇa-paṭalī bhūṣitā dogdhi bhūṣām || RBhrs_2,1.360 ||

GR14ruphbr_u:2476: kim atra sūryātapam ākṣipantī mugdhākṣi cāturyam urīkaroṣi |

GR14ruphbr_u:2499: śrīdāmno yoddhu-kāmasya reme romāñcitaṃ vapuḥ || RBhrs_2,3.35 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2501: viśva-rūpa-dharam adbhutākṛtiṃ prekṣya tatra puruṣottamaṃ puraḥ |

GR14ruphbr_u:2510: hriyam eṇadṛśā gurāv api ślathayantyā kila roditā sakhī || RBhrs_2,3.38 ||

GR14ruphbr_u:2523: tvayy arpitaṃ vitara veṇum iti pramādī śrutvā mad-īritam udīrṇa-vivarṇa-bhāvaḥ |

GR14ruphbr_u:2535: cakampe drāg amarṣeṇa bhū-kampe girirāḍ iva || RBhrs_2,3.45 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2537: vihasasi kathaṃ hatāśe paśya bhayenādya kampamānāsmi |

GR14ruphbr_u:2544: gokulaṃ kṛṣṇa devarṣeḥ śvetadvīpa-bhramaṃ dadhe || RBhrs_2,3.48 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2546: kaṃsa-śatrum abhiyuñjataḥ puro vīkṣya kaṃsa-sahajān udāyudhān |

GR14ruphbr_u:2552: viṣāde śvetimā proktā dhausaryaṃ kālimā kvacit |

GR14ruphbr_u:2573: āsiñcatī kuṅkuma-rūṣitau stanau tasthāv adho-mukhy atiduḥkha-ruddha-vāk || RBhrs_2,3.57 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2582: nābhyajānan imaṃ lokam ātma-lokaṃ gatā iva || RBhrs_2,3.60 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2583: sarve hi sattva-mūlatvād bhāvā yadyapi sāttvikāḥ |

GR14ruphbr_u:2588: vṛddhiṃ yathottaraṃ yāntaḥ sāttvikāḥ syuś catur-vidhāḥ || RBhrs_2,3.63 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2590: svarūpeṇa tathotkarṣa iti vṛddhis tridhā bhavet || RBhrs_2,3.64 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2598: prāyo dhūmāyitā eva rukṣās tiṣṭhanti sāttvikāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:2599: snigdhās tu prāyaśaḥ sarve caturdhaiva bhavanty amī || RBhrs_2,3.68 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2601: jvalanty ullāsinaḥ kvāpi te rukṣā api kasyacit || RBhrs_2,3.69 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2603: ete hi tad-vinābhāvān na camatkāritāśrayāḥ || RBhrs_2,3.70 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2606: īṣad-vyaktā apahnotuṃ śakyā dhūmāyitā matāḥ || RBhrs_2,3.71 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2613: te dvau trayo vā yugapad yāntaḥ suprakaṭāṃ daśām |
GR14ruphbr_u:2614: śakyāḥ kṛcchreṇa nihnotuṃ jvalitā iti kīrtitāḥ || RBhrs_2,3.73 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2616: na guñjām ādātuṃ prabhavati karaḥ kampa-taralo
GR14ruphbr_u:2617: dṛśau sāsre piñchaṃ na paricinutaṃ satvara-kṛti |
GR14ruphbr_u:2618: kṣamāv ūrū stabdhau padam api na gantuṃ tava sakhe vanād vaṃśī-dhvāne parisaram avāpte śravaṇayoḥ yathā vā--
GR14ruphbr_u:2619: niruddhaṃ bāṣpāmbhaḥ katham api mayā gadgada-giro
GR14ruphbr_u:2620: hriyā sadyo gūḍhāḥ sakhi vighaṭito vepathur api |
GR14ruphbr_u:2622: tathāpy ūhāñcakre mama manasi rāgaḥ parijanaiḥ || RBhrs_2,3.75 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2624: prauḍhāṃ tri-caturā vyaktiṃ pañca vā yugapad-gatāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:2625: saṃvarītum aśakyās te dīptā dhīrair udāhṛtāḥ || RBhrs_2,3.76 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2627: na śaktim upavīṇane ciram adhatta kampākulo na gadgada-niruddha-vāk prabhur abhūd upaślokane
GR14ruphbr_u:2629: madhu-dviṣi parisphuraty avaśam-mūrtir āsīn muniḥ || RBhrs_2,3.77 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2631: kim unmīlaty asre kusumaja-rajo gañjasi mudhā sa-romāñce kampe himam anilam ākrośasi kutaḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:2632: kim ūru-stambhe vā vana-viharaṇaṃ dvekṣi sakhi te
GR14ruphbr_u:2633: nirābādhā rādhe vadati madanādhiṃ svara-bhidā || RBhrs_2,3.78 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2635: ekadā vyaktim āpannāḥ pañca-ṣāḥ sarva eva vā |
GR14ruphbr_u:2636: ārūḍhā paramotkarṣam uddīptā iti kīrtitāḥ || RBhrs_2,3.79 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2638: adya svidyati vepate pulakibhir nispandatām aṅgakair dhatte kākubhir ākulaṃ vilapati mlāyaty analpoṣmabhiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:2639: stimyaty ambubhir ambaka-stavakitaiḥ pītāmbaroḍḍāmaraṃ sadyas tad-viraheṇa muhyati muhur goṣṭhādhivāsī janaḥ || RBhrs_2,3.80 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2640: uddīptā eva sūddiptā mahā-bhāve bhavanty amī |
GR14ruphbr_u:2641: sarva eva parāṃ koṭiṃ sāttvikā yatra bibhrati || RBhrs_2,3.81 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2645: niḥsattvāś ca pratīpāś ca yathā-pūrvam amī varāḥ || RBhrs_2,3.83 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2649: vārāṇasī-nivāsī kaścid ayaṃ vyāharan hareś caritam |
GR14ruphbr_u:2650: yati-goṣṭhyām utpulakaḥ siñcati gaṇḍa-dvayīm asraiḥ || RBhrs_2,3.85 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2652: mud-vismayāder ābhāsaḥ prodyan jātyā ślathe hṛdi |
GR14ruphbr_u:2653: sattvābhāsa iti proktaḥ sattvābhāsa-bhavās tataḥ || RBhrs_2,3.86 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2658: mukunda-caritāmṛta-prasara-varṣiṇas te mayā kathaṃ kathana-cāturī-madhurimā gurur varṇyatām
GR14ruphbr_u:2659: muhūrtam atad-arthino 'pi viṣayiṇo 'pi yasyānanān niśamya vijayaṃ prabhor dadhati bāṣpa-dhārām amī || RBhrs_2,3.88 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2662: sattvābhāsaṃ vināpi syuḥ kvāpy aśru-pulakādayaḥ || RBhrs_2,3.89 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2664: niśamayato hari-caritaṃ na hi sukha-duḥkhādayo 'sya hṛdi bhāvāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:2665: anabhiniveśāj jātā katham asravad asram aśrāntam || RBhrs_2,3.90 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2666: prakṛtyā śithilaṃ yeṣāṃ manaḥ picchilam eva vā |
GR14ruphbr_u:2667: teṣv eva sāttvikābhāsaḥ prāyaḥ saṃsadi jāyate || RBhrs_2,3.91 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2669: hitād anyasya kṛṣṇasya pratīpāḥ krud-bhayādibhiḥ || RBhrs_2,3.92 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2672: vaktraṃ kaṃsasya roṣeṇa rakta-sūryāyate tadā || RBhrs_2,3.93 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2674: mlānānanaḥ kṛṣṇam avekṣya raṅge siṣveda mallas tv adhi-bhāla-śukti |
GR14ruphbr_u:2678: pravācyamāne purataḥ purāṇe niśamya kaṃsasya bhayātirekam |
GR14ruphbr_u:2681: sāttvikānāṃ vivekāya dik tathāpi pradarśitā || RBhrs_2,3.96 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2690: ūrmivad vardhayanty enaṃ yānti tad-rūpatāṃ ca te || RBhrs_2,4.3 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2691: nirvedo 'tha viṣādo dainyaṃ glāni-śramau ca mada-garvau |
GR14ruphbr_u:2693: moho mṛtir ālasyaṃ jāḍyaṃ vrīḍāvahitthā ca |
GR14ruphbr_u:2694: smṛtir atha vitarka-cintā-mati-dhṛtayo harṣa utsukatvaṃ ca || RBhrs_2,4.5
GR14ruphbr_u:2695: augryam arṣāsūyāś cāpalyaṃ caiva nidrā ca |
GR14ruphbr_u:2696: suptir bodha itīme bhāvā vyabhicāriṇaḥ samākhyātāḥ || RBhrs_2,4.6 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2702: hanta deha-hatakaiḥ kim amībhiḥ pālitair viphala-puṇya-phalair naḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:2711: bhavatu mādhava-jalpam aśṛṇvatoḥ śravaṇayor alam aśravaṇir mama |
GR14ruphbr_u:2712: tam avilokayator avilocaniḥ sakhi vilocanayoś ca kilānayoḥ || RBhrs_2,4.10 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2713: īrṣyayā, yathā hari-vaṃśe (2.67.11) {*In critical edition, appendix 29.}
GR14ruphbr_u:2715: stotavyā yadi tāvat sā nāradena tavāgrataḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:2716: durbhago 'yaṃ janas tatra kim artham anuśabditaḥ || RBhrs_2,4.11 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2718: mamaiṣa kālo 'jita niṣphalo gato rājya-śriyonnaddha-madasya bhūpateḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:2721: amaṅgalam api procya nirvedaṃ prathamaṃ muniḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:2722: mene 'muṃ sthāyinaṃ śānta iti jalpanti kecana || RBhrs_2,4.13 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2729: jarāṃ yātā mūrtir mama vivaśatāṃ vāg api gatā mano-vṛttiś ceyaṃ smṛti-vidhuratā-paddhatim agāt |
GR14ruphbr_u:2731: mayā hanta prāpto na bhajana-rucer apy avasaraḥ || RBhrs_2,4.16 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2733: svapne mayādya kusumāni kilāhṛtāni yatnena tair viracitā vana-mālikā ca |
GR14ruphbr_u:2735: hā tāvad eva tarasā virarāma nidrā || RBhrs_2,4.17 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2737: katham anāyi pure mayakā sutaḥ katham asau na nigṛhya gṛhe dhṛtaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:2741: paśyeśa me 'nāryam ananta ādye parātmani tvayy api māyi-māyini
GR14ruphbr_u:2743: hy ahaṃ kiyān aiccham ivārcir agnau || RBhrs_2,4.19 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2745: syamantakam ahaṃ hṛtvā gato ghorāsyam antakam |
GR14ruphbr_u:2746: karavai taraṇīṃ kāṃ vā kṣipto vaitaraṇīyam anu || RBhrs_2,4.20 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2753: śaraṇada samupetas tvat-padābjaṃ parātmann abhayam ṛtam aśokaṃ pāhi māpannam īśa || RBhrs_2,4.22
GR14ruphbr_u:2755: abhidravati mām īśa śaras taptāyaso vibho |
GR14ruphbr_u:2756: kāmaṃ dahatu māṃ nātha mā me garbho nipātyatām || RBhrs_2,4.23 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2763: mā'nayaṃ bhoḥ kṛthās tvāṃ tu nanda-gopa-sutaṃ priyam |
GR14ruphbr_u:2764: jānīmo 'ṅga vraja-ślāghyaṃ dehi vāsāṃsi vepitāḥ || RBhrs_2,4.25 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2766: ojaḥ somātmakaṃ dehe bala-puṣṭi-kṛd asya tu |
GR14ruphbr_u:2772: lolākṣī dadhi-kalasaṃ viloḍayantī kṛṣṇāya klama-bhara-niḥspṛhā babhūva || RBhrs_2,4.27 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2781: mādhavādya viraheṇa tavāmbā śuṣyati sma sarasī śucineva || RBhrs_2,4.29 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2797: asvidyad viracita-nanda-sūnur vā kurvāṇas taṭa-bhuvi tāṇḍavāni rāmaḥ || RBhrs_2,4.33 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2800: prāmṛjat karuṇaḥ premṇā śantamenāṅga pāṇinā || RBhrs_2,4.34 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2802: viveka-hara ullāso madaḥ sa dvi-vidho mataḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:2806: bile kva nu vililyire nṛpa-pipīlikāḥ pīḍitāḥ pinasmi jagad-aṇḍakaṃ nanu hariḥ krudhaṃ dhāsyati
GR14ruphbr_u:2807: śacī-gṛha-kuraṅga re hasasi kiṃ tvam ity unnadann
GR14ruphbr_u:2811: kṛ-kṛṣṇa vavada drutaṃ ha-ha-hasanti kiṃ vṛṣṇayaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:2813: mada-skhalitam ālapan hala-dharaḥ śriyaḥ vaḥ kriyāt || RBhrs_2,4.37 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2814: uttamas tu madāc chete madhyo hasati pāyati |
GR14ruphbr_u:2815: kaniṣṭhaḥ krośati svairaṃ puruṣaṃ vakti roditi || RBhrs_2,4.38 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2817: atra nātyupayogitvād vistārya na hi varṇitaḥ || RBhrs_2,4.39 ||

GR14ruphbr_u:2829: hastam utkṣipya yāto 'si balāt kṛṣṇa kim adbhutam |
GR14ruphbr_u:2830: hṛdayād yadi niryāsi pauruṣaṃ gaṇayāmi te || RBhrs_2,4.43 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2832: yasyāḥ svabhāva-madhurāṃ pariṣevya mūrtiṃ dhanyā babhūva nitarām api yauvana-śrīḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:2834: dṛk-pātam ācaratu kṛṣṇa kathaṃ sakhī me || RBhrs_2,4.44 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2836: gumphantu gopāḥ kusumaiḥ sugandhibhir dāmāni kāmaṃ dhṛta-rāmaṇīyakaiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:2837: nidhāsyate kintu sa-tṛṣṇam agrataḥ kṛṣṇo madīyāṃ hṛdi vismitaḥ srajam || RBhrs_2,4.45 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2839: tathā na te mādhava tāvakāḥ kvacid bhraśyanti mārgāt tvayi baddha-sauhṛdāḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:2843: vṛndāvanendra bhavataḥ paramaṃ prasādam āsādya nandita-matir muhur uddhato 'smi |
GR14ruphbr_u:2848: svāniṣṭotprekṣaṇaṃ yat tu sā śaṅkety abhidhīyate |
GR14ruphbr_u:2853: tirobhaviṣyan haritaś calekṣaṇair aṣṭābhir aṣṭau haritaḥ samīkṣate || RBhrs_2,4.49 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2855: syamantakaṃ hanta vamantam arthaṃ nihnutya dūre yad ahaṃ prayātaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:2856: avadyam adyāpi tad eva karma śarmāṇi citte mama nirbhinatti || RBhrs_2,4.50 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2860: śṛṇu hitam abhitaḥ prapadya kṛṣṇaṃ śriyam aviśaṅkam alaṅkuru tvam aindrīm || RBhrs_2,4.51

GR14ruphbr_u:2863: kaṭubhir asura-maṇḍalaiḥ parīte danujapater nagare yathāsya vāsaḥ || RBhrs_2,4.52 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2864: śaṅkā tu pravara-strīṇāṃ bhīrutvād bhaya-kṛd bhavet || RBhrs_2,4.53 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2870: rakṣa kṛṣṇeti cukrośa ko 'pi gopī-stanandhayaḥ || RBhrs_2,4.55 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2872: adūram āseduṣi vallavāṅganā svaṃ puṅgavīkṛtya surāri-puṅgave |

GR14ruphbr_u:2880: pūrvāpara-vicārotthaṃ bhayaṃ trāsāt pṛthag bhavet || RBhrs_2,4.58 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2882: cittasya sambhramo yaḥ syād āvego 'yaṃ sa cāṣṭadhā |
GR14ruphbr_u:2894: saṅkulā pulakair āsīd ākulā gokuleśvarī || RBhrs_2,4.64 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2899: kim idaṃ kim idaṃ kim etad uccair iti ghora-dhvani-ghūrṇitā lapantī |
GR14ruphbr_u:2900: niśi vakṣati vīkṣya pūtanāyās tanayaṃ bhrāmyati sambhramād yaśodā || RBhrs_2,4.66 ||

GR14ruphbr_u:2903: ābhīra-rājñī hṛdi sambhrameṇa biddhā vidheyaṃ na vidāñcakāra || RBhrs_2,4.67 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2905: dhīr vyagrājani naḥ samasta-suhṛdāṃ tāṃ prāṇa-rakṣā-maṇiṃ

GR14ruphbr_u:2907: vahniḥ paśya śikhaṇḍa-śekhara kharaṃ muñcann akhaṇḍa-dhvaniṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:2912: vāta-vrāte karīṣaṅ-kaṣatara-śikhare śārkare jhātkariṣṇau kṣauṇyām aprekṣya putraṃ vrajapati-gṛhiṇī paśya sambambhramīti ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2915: gopā gopyaś ca śītārtā govindaṃ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ || RBhrs_2,4.70 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2919: ajaniṣata yuvāno 'py ākulās tvaṃ tu bālaḥ sphuṭam asi tad-agārān mā sma bhūr niryiyāsuḥ || utpātajo, yathā--
GR14ruphbr_u:2920: kṣitir ativipulā ṭalaty akasmād upari ghuranti ca hanta ghoram ulkāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:2922: taṭam aṭatīty adhunā kim atra kuryām || RBhrs_2,4.72 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2930: caṇḍāṃśos turagān saṭāgra-naṭanair āhatya vidrāvayan drāg andhaṅkaraṇaḥ surendra-sudṛśāṃ goṣṭhoddhūtaiḥ pāṃśubhiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:2931: pratyāsīdatu mat-puraḥ sura-ripur garvāndham arvākṛtir dragiṣṭhe muhur atra jāgrati bhuje vyagrāsi mātaḥ katham || RBhrs_2,4.75
GR14ruphbr_u:2933: sthūlas tāla-bhujān natir giritaṭī-vakṣāḥ kva yakṣādhamaḥ kvāyaṃ bāla-tamāla-kandala-mṛduḥ kandarpa-kāntaḥ śiśuḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:2934: nāsty anyaḥ saha-kāritā-paṭur iha prāṇī na jānīmahe hā goṣṭheśvari kīdṛg adya tapasāṃ pākas tavonmīlati || RBhrs_2,4.76 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2936: saptiḥ saptī ratha iha rathaḥ kuñjaro me tūṇas tūṇo dhanur uta dhanur bhoḥ kṛpāṇī kṛpāṇī |
GR14ruphbr_u:2937: kā bhīḥ kā bhīr ayam ayam ahaṃ hā tvaradhvaṃ tvaradhvaṃ rājñaḥ putrī bata hṛta-hṛtā kāminā vallavena || RBhrs_2,4.77 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2950: paśūn api kṛtāñjalir namati māntrikā ity alaṃ tarūn api cikitsakā iti viṣauṣadhaṃ pṛcchati
GR14ruphbr_u:2951: hradaṃ bhujaga-bhairavaṃ hari hari praviṣṭe harau

GR14ruphbr_u:2954: gāyantya uccair amum eva saṃhatā vicikyur unmattakavad vanād vanam |
GR14ruphbr_u:2955: papracchur ākāśavad antaraṃ bahir bhūteṣu santaṃ puruṣaṃ vanaspatīn || RBhrs_2,4.83 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2956: unmādaḥ pṛthag ukto 'yaṃ vyādhiṣv antarbhavann api |
GR14ruphbr_u:2957: yat tatra vipralambhādau vaicitrīṃ kurute parām || RBhrs_2,4.84 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2965: phenāyate pratipadaṃ kṣipate bhujormim āghūrṇate luṭhati kujati līyate ca |
GR14ruphbr_u:2969: śrutvā hanta hataṃ tvayā yadu-kulottaṃsātra kaṃsāsuraṃ daityas tasya suhṛttamaḥ pariṇatiṃ ghorāṃ gataḥ kām api |
GR14ruphbr_u:2971: ghūrṇann arṇava-sīmni maṇḍalatayā bhrāmyan na viśrāmyati || RBhrs_2,4.88
GR14ruphbr_u:2973: parāṃ bhayānakābhāse yat karoti camatkṛtim || RBhrs_2,4.89 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2976: iha tat-prabhavo bhāvo vyādhir ity abhidhīyate |
GR14ruphbr_u:2984: moho hṛn-mūḍhatā harṣād viśleṣād bhayatas tathā |
GR14ruphbr_u:2985: viṣādādeś ca tatra syād dehasya patanaṃ bhuvi |
GR14ruphbr_u:2988: itthaṃ sma pṛṣṭaḥ sa tu bādarāyaṇis
GR14ruphbr_u:2990: kṛcchrāt punar labdha-bahir-dṛśiḥ śanaiḥ pratyāha taṃ bhāgavatottamottamam || RBhrs_2,4.93
GR14ruphbr_u:2994: avekṣya kuru-maṇḍale rahasi puṇḍarīkekṣaṇaṃ vrajāmbuja-dṛśo 'bhajan kanaka-śālabhañjī-śriyam viśleṣād, yathā haṃsadūte (4)--
GR14ruphbr_u:2995: kadācit khedāgniṃ vighaṭayitum antar-gatam asau sahālībhir lebhe taralita-manā yāmuna-taṭīm
GR14ruphbr_u:2997: avasthā tastāra sphuṭam atha suṣupteḥ priya-sakhī || RBhrs_2,4.95 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3001: karāravindāt purataḥ skhalantaṃ na gāṇḍīvaṃ khaṇḍita-dhīr viveda || RBhrs_2,4.96 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3004: babhūvur indriyāṇīva vinā prāṇaṃ vicetasaḥ || RBhrs_2,4.97 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3006: kṛṣṇa-sphūrti-viśeṣas tu na kadāpy atra līyate || RBhrs_2,4.98 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3013: vivṛṇvantaḥ kāye kim api nava-vaivarṇyam abhitaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3015: prajalpantaḥ prāṇān jahati mathurāyāṃ sukṛtinaḥ || RBhrs_2,4.100 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3020: kṣayam agamad akasmāt pūtanā kāla-rātriḥ || RBhrs_2,4.101 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3021: prāyo 'tra maraṇāt pūrvā citta-vṛttir mṛtir matā |
GR14ruphbr_u:3022: mṛtir atrānubhāvaḥ syād iti kenacid ucyate |
GR14ruphbr_u:3023: kintu nāyaka-vīryārthaṃ śatrau maraṇam ucyate || RBhrs_2,4.102 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3030: viprāṇāṃ nas tathā tṛptir āsīd govardhanotsave |

GR14ruphbr_u:3497: mukhya-bhāvābhidhās tv eka-catvāriṃśad amī smṛtāḥ || RBhrs_2,4.250 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3500: kvacit svābhāviko bhāvaḥ kaścid āgantukaḥ kvacit |
GR14ruphbr_u:3501: yas tu svābhāviko bhāvaḥ sa vyāpyāntar-bahiḥ-sthitaḥ || RBhrs_2,4.252 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3502: mañjiṣṭhādye yathā dravye rāgas tan-maya īkṣyate |
GR14ruphbr_u:3503: atra syān nāma-mātreṇa vibhāvasya vibhāvatā || RBhrs_2,4.253 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3505: eka-rūpāpi yā bhakter vividhā pratibhāty asau || RBhrs_2,4.254 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3506: āgantukas tu yo bhāvaḥ paṭādau raktimeva saḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3507: tais tair vibhāvair evāyaṃ dhīyate dīpyate 'pi ca || RBhrs_2,4.255 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3510: vividhānāṃ tu bhaktānāṃ vaiśiṣṭyād vividhaṃ manaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3513: samyag-unmīlitāś cāmī na lakṣyante sphuṭaṃ janaiḥ || RBhrs_2,4.258 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3515: manāg-unmīlitāś cāmī lakṣyante bahir ulbaṇāḥ || RBhrs_2,4.259 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3520: pattanābhaṃ mahiṣṭhaṃ syāt kṣodiṣṭhaṃ tu kuṭiravat |
GR14ruphbr_u:3522: karkaśaṃ trividhaṃ proktaṃ vajraṃ svarṇaṃ tathā jatu |
GR14ruphbr_u:3525: īdṛśaṃ tāpasādīnāṃ cittaṃ tāvad avekṣyate || RBhrs_2,4.264 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3527: jatu dravatvam āyāti tāpa-leśena sarvataḥ || RBhrs_2,4.265 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3529: amṛtaṃ ceti bhāvo 'tra prāyaḥ sūryātapāyate || RBhrs_2,4.266 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3532: govinda-preṣṭha-varyāṇāṃ cittaṃ syād amṛtaṃ kila || RBhrs_2,4.267 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3534: samavetaṃ sadāmībhir dvitrair api mano bhavet || RBhrs_2,4.268 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3535: kintu suṣṭhu mahiṣṭhatvaṃ bhāvo bāḍham upāgataḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3536: sarva-prakāram evedaṃ cittaṃ vikṣobhayaty alam || RBhrs_2,4.269 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3538: gabhīro 'py aśrāntaṃ duradhigama-pāro 'pi nitarām ahāryāṃ maryādāṃ dadhad api harer āspadam api |
GR14ruphbr_u:3539: satāṃ stomaḥ premaṇy udayati samagre sthagayituṃ vikāraṃ na sphāraṃ jala-nidhir ivendau prabhavati iti śrī-śrī-bhakti-rasāmṛta-sindhau dakṣiṇa-vibhāge
GR14ruphbr_u:3542: aviruddhān viruddhāṃś ca bhāvān yo vaśatāṃ nayan |
GR14ruphbr_u:3543: su-rājeva virājeta sa sthāyī bhāva ucyate || RBhrs_2,5.1 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3544: sthāyī bhāvo 'tra sa proktaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇa-viṣayā ratiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3545: mukhyā gauṇī ca sā dvedhā rasa-jñaiḥ parikīrtitā || RBhrs_2,5.2 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3548: mukhyāpi dvi-vidhā svārthā parārthā ceti kīrtyate || RBhrs_2,5.3 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3550: aviruddhaiḥ sphuṭaṃ bhāvaiḥ puṣṇāty ātmānam eva yā |
GR14ruphbr_u:3551: viruddhair duḥkha-glāniḥ sā svārthā kathitā ratiḥ || RBhrs_2,5.4 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3553: aviruddhaṃ viruddhaṃ ca saṅkucantī svayaṃ ratiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3554: yā bhāvam anugṛhṇāti sā parārthā nigadyate || RBhrs_2,5.5 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3555: śuddhā prītis tathā sakhyaṃ vātsalyaṃ priyatety asau |
GR14ruphbr_u:3556: svaparārthyaiva sā mukhyā punaḥ pañca-vidhā bhavet || RBhrs_2,5.6 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3560: sāmānyāsau tathā svacchā śāntiś cety ādimā tridhā |
GR14ruphbr_u:3564: bālikadaiś ca kṛṣṇe syāt sāmānyā sā ratir matā || RBhrs_2,5.9 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3566: asmin mathurā-vīthyām udayati madhure virocane purataḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3567: kathasva sakhe mradimānaṃ mānasa-madanaṃ kim eti mama || RBhrs_2,5.10 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3570: yā puraḥ kṛṣṇam ālokya huṅkurvaty abhidhāvati || RBhrs_2,5.11 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3573: sādhākānāṃ tu vaividhyaṃ yāntī svacchā ratir matā || RBhrs_2,5.12 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3574: yadā yādṛśī bhakte syād āsaktis tādṛśaṃ tadā |
GR14ruphbr_u:3575: rūpaṃ sphaṭikavad dhatte svacchāsau tena kīrtitā || RBhrs_2,5.13 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3577: kvacit prabhur iti stuvan kvacana mitram ity uddhasan kvacit tanaya ity avan kvacana kānta ity ullasan |
GR14ruphbr_u:3578: kvacin manasi bhāvayan parama eṣa ātmety asāv abhūd vividha-sevayā vividha-vṛttir āryo dvijaḥ anācānta-dhiyāṃ tat-tad-bhāva-niṣṭhā sukhārṇave |
GR14ruphbr_u:3579: āryāṇām atiśuddhānāṃ prāyaḥ svacchā ratir bhavet || RBhrs_2,5.15 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3581: mānase nirvikalpatvaṃ śama ity abhidhīyate || RBhrs_2,5.16 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3584: ātmanaḥ kathyate so 'tra svabhāvaḥ śama ity asau || RBhrs_2,5.17 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3586: paramātmatayā kṛṣṇe jātā śānta-ratir matā || RBhrs_2,5.18 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3589: sanakasya tanau kampo brahmānubhavino 'py abhūt || RBhrs_2,5.19 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3593: ghana-sundaram ātmano 'py abhīṣṭaṃ paramaṃ brahma didṛkṣate mano me || RBhrs_2,5.20 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3595: rater asyā asamparkād iyaṃ śuddheti bhaṇyate || RBhrs_2,5.21 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3596: atha bheda-trayī hṛdyā rateḥ prīty-ādir īryate |
GR14ruphbr_u:3599: tri-vidheṣu trayī prītiḥ sakhyaṃ vatsalatety asau || RBhrs_2,5.23 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3601: kevalā saṅkulā ceti dvi-vidheyaṃ rati-trayī || RBhrs_2,5.24 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3605: gurau ca vrajanāthādau krameṇaiva sphuraty asau || RBhrs_2,5.25 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3607: eṣāṃ dvayos trayāṇāṃ vā sannipātas tu saṅkulā |
GR14ruphbr_u:3608: udbhavādau ca bhīmādau mathurādau krameṇa sā |
GR14ruphbr_u:3609: yasyādhikyaṃ bhaved yatra sa tena vyapadiśyate || RBhrs_2,5.26 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3611: svasmād bhavanti ye nyūnās te 'nugrāhyā harer matāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3612: ārādhyatvātmikā teṣāṃ ratiḥ prītir itīritā || RBhrs_2,5.27 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3613: tatrāsakti-kṛd anyatra prīti-saṃhāriṇī hy asau || RBhrs_2,5.28 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3615: divi vā bhuvi vā mamāstu vāso narake vā narakāntaka prakāmam |
GR14ruphbr_u:3619: ye syus tulyā mukundasya te sakhāyaḥ satāṃ matāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3628: śrīdāma-dor-vilasitena kṛto 'si kāmaṃ dāmodara tvam iha darpa-dhurā daridraḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3629: sadyas tvayā tad api kathanam eva kṛtvā devyai hriye trayam adāyi jvalāñjalīnām || RBhrs_2,5.32
GR14ruphbr_u:3631: guravo ye harer asya te pūjyā iti viśrutāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3637: gās tatra rakṣitum asau gahane mṛdur me bālaḥ prayāty avirataṃ bata kiṃ karomi || RBhrs_2,5.34
GR14ruphbr_u:3650: ratir vāsanayā svādvī bhāsate kāpi kasyacit || RBhrs_2,5.38 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3653: saṅkucantyā svayaṃ ratyā sa gauṇī ratir ucyate || RBhrs_2,5.39 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3654: hāso vismaya utsāhaḥ śokaḥ krodho bhayaṃ tathā |
GR14ruphbr_u:3655: jugupsā cety asau bhāva-viśeṣaḥ saptadhoditaḥ || RBhrs_2,5.40 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3657: syād dehādi-vibhāvatvaṃ saptamyās tu rater vaśāt || RBhrs_2,5.41 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3659: parārthāyā rater yogād rati-śabdaḥ prayujyate || RBhrs_2,5.42 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3660: hāsottarā ratir yā syāt sā hāsa-ratir ucyate |
GR14ruphbr_u:3661: evaṃ vismaya-raty-ādyā vijñeyā ratayaś ca ṣaṭ || RBhrs_2,5.43 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3662: kañcit kālaṃ kvacid bhakte hāsādyāḥ sthāyitām amī |
GR14ruphbr_u:3665: sahajā api līyante baliṣṭhena tiraskṛtāḥ || RBhrs_2,5.45 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3668: syur etasyā vinā-bhāvād bhāvāḥ sarve nirarthakāḥ || RBhrs_2,5.46 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3672: nirvedādyā vilīyante nārhanti sthāyitāṃ tataḥ || RBhrs_2,5.48 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3673: ity ato mati-garvādi-bhāvānāṃ ghaṭate na hi |
GR14ruphbr_u:3674: sthāyitā kaiścid iṣṭāpi pramāṇaṃ tatra tad-vidaḥ || RBhrs_2,5.49 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3675: sapta hāsādayas tv ete tais tair nītāḥ supuṣṭatām |
GR14ruphbr_u:3676: bhakteṣu sthāyitāṃ yānto rucir ebhyo vitanvate || RBhrs_2,5.50 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3686: mayā dṛg api nārpitā sumukhi dadhni tubhyaṃ śape sakhī tava nirargalā tad api me mukhaṃ jighrati
GR14ruphbr_u:3687: praśādhi tad imāṃ mudhā cchalita-sādhum ity acyute vadaty ajani dūtikā hasita-rodhane na kṣamā || RBhrs_2,5.54 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3691: pūrvokta-rītyā niṣpannaḥ sa vismaya-ratir bhavet || RBhrs_2,5.55 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3696: para-brahmollāsān vahati kim idaṃ hanta kim idam || RBhrs_2,5.56 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3699: satvarā mānasāsaktir utsāha iti kīrtyate || RBhrs_2,5.57 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3701: siddhaḥ pūrvokta-vidhinā sa utsāha ratir bhavet || RBhrs_2,5.58 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3712: ruditam anu niśamya tatra gopyo bhṛśam anutapta-dhiyo 'śru-pūrṇa-mukhyaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3718: hṛdayaṃ na vidīryati dvidhā dhig imāṃ martya-tanoḥ kaṭhoratām || RBhrs_2,5.62 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3737: niṣpannaṃ pūrvavad idaṃ budhā bhaya-ratiṃ viduḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3738: eṣāpi krodha-rativad dvi-vidhā kathitā budhaiḥ || RBhrs_2,5.68 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3740: yācitaḥ paṭimabhiḥ syamantakaṃ śauriṇā sadasi gāndinī-sutaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3751: rater anugrahāj jātā sā jugupsā-ratir matā || RBhrs_2,5.71 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3755: tadavadhi bata nārī-saṅgame smaryamāne bhavati mukha-vikāraḥ suṣṭhu-niṣṭhīvanaṃ ca || RBhrs_2,5.72
GR14ruphbr_u:3757: ity aṣṭau sthāyino yāvad rasāvasthāṃ na saṃśritāḥ || RBhrs_2,5.73 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3759: ihāṣṭau sāttvikāś caite bhāvākhyās tān asaṅkhyakāḥ || RBhrs_2,5.74 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3765: prāyaḥ sukha-mayāḥ śītā uṣṇā duḥkha-mayā iha |
GR14ruphbr_u:3766: citreyaṃ paramānanda-sāndrāpy uṣṇā ratir matā || RBhrs_2,5.77 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3767: śītair bhāvair baliṣṭhais tu puṣṭā śītāyate hy asau |
GR14ruphbr_u:3768: uṣṇais tu ratir atyuṣṇā tāpayantīva bhāsate || RBhrs_2,5.78 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3769: ratir dvidhāpi kṛṣṇādyaiḥ śrutair avagataiḥ smṛtaiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3770: tair vibhāvāditāṃ yadbhis tad-bhakteṣu raso bhavet || RBhrs_2,5.79 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3779: gacchanto rasa-rūpatvaṃ militā yānty akhaṇḍatām || RBhrs_2,5.83 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3781: udbhāsaḥ kasyacit kvāpi vibhāvādes tathā rase || RBhrs_2,5.84 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3783: stambhādyāḥ kāra-bhūtāś ca nirvedādyāḥ sahāyakāḥ || RBhrs_2,5.85 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3787: vibhāvayanti kurvantīty uktā dhīrair vibhāvakāḥ || RBhrs_2,5.87 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3789: ity uktā anubhāvās te kaṭākṣādyāḥ sa-sāttvikāḥ || RBhrs_2,5.88 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3791: ye nirvedādayo bhāvās te tu sañcāriṇo matāḥ || RBhrs_2,5.89 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3793: sevām āhuḥ paraṃ hetuṃ kecit tat-pakṣa-rāgiṇaḥ || RBhrs_2,5.90 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3795: rater asyāḥ prabhāvo 'yaṃ bhavet kāraṇam uttamam || RBhrs_2,5.91 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3797: raty-ākhyā ity ayaṃ yukto na hi tarkeṇa bādhitum |
GR14ruphbr_u:3798: bhāratādy-uktir eṣā hi prāktanair apy udāhṛtā || RBhrs_2,5.92 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3800: acintyāḥ khalu ye bhāvā na tāṃs tarkeṇa yojayet prakṛtibhyaḥ paraṃ yac ca tad acintyasya lakṣaṇam vibhāvatādīn ānīya kṛṣṇādīn mañjulā ratiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3801: etair eva tathābhūtaiḥ svaṃ saṃvardhayati sphuṭam || RBhrs_2,5.94 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3802: yathā svair eva salilaiḥ paripūrya balāhakān |
GR14ruphbr_u:3803: ratnālayo bhavaty ebhir vṛṣṭais tair eva vāridhiḥ || RBhrs_2,5.95 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3807: rater eva prabhāvo 'yaṃ hetus teṣāṃ tathākṛtau || RBhrs_2,5.97 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3809: tathānubhūyamānās te vistīrṇāṃ kurvate ratim || RBhrs_2,5.98 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3811: atra sāhāyikaṃ vyaktaṃ mitho 'jasram avekṣyate || RBhrs_2,5.99 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3812: kintv etasyāḥ prabhāvo 'pi vairūpye sati kuñcati |
GR14ruphbr_u:3813: vairūpyas tu vibhāvāder anaucityam udīryate || RBhrs_2,5.100 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3815: yatra sādhāraṇatayā bhāvāḥ sādhu sphuranty amī || RBhrs_2,5.101 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3817: sādhāraṇyaṃ tad evoktaṃ bhāvānāṃ pūrva-sūribhiḥ || RBhrs_2,5.102 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3820: pramātā tad-abhedena svaṃ yayā pratipadyate || RBhrs_2,5.103 || iti |
GR14ruphbr_u:3821: duḥkhādayaḥ sphuranto 'pi jātu bhāntaḥ svīyatayā hṛdi |
GR14ruphbr_u:3829: rasaḥ syān neti nāṭya-jñā yad āhur yuktam eva tat || RBhrs_2,5.107 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3831: yoge rasa-viśeṣatvaṃ gacchanty eva hari-priye || RBhrs_2,5.108 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3840: rasasya sva-prakāśatvam akhaṇḍatvaṃ ca sidhyati || RBhrs_2,5.112 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3841: pūrvam uktād dvidhā bhdedān mukhya-gauṇatayā rateḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3842: bhaved bhakti-raso 'py eṣa mukhya-gauṇatayā dvidhā || RBhrs_2,5.113 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3843: pañcadhāpi rater aikyān mukhyas tv eka ihoditaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3844: saptadhātra tathā gauṇa iti bhakti-raso 'ṣṭadhā || RBhrs_2,5.114 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3846: mukhyas tu pañcadhā śāntaḥ prītaḥ preyāṃś ca vatsalaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3847: madhuraś cety amī jñeyā yathā-pūrvam anuttamāḥ || RBhrs_2,5.115 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3849: hāsyo 'dbhutas tathā vīraḥ karuṇo raudra ity api |
GR14ruphbr_u:3850: bhayānakaḥ sa bībhatsa iti gauṇaś ca saptadhā || RBhrs_2,5.116 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3852: vastutas tu purāṇādau pañcadhaiva vilokyate || RBhrs_2,5.117 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3854: gauro dhūmras tathā raktaḥ kālo nītaḥ kramād amī || RBhrs_2,5.118 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3856: balaḥ kūrmas tathā kalkī rāghavo bhārgavaḥ kiriḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3857: mīna ity eṣu kathitāḥ kramād dvādaśa devatāḥ || RBhrs_2,5.119 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3860: pūrtiḥ śānte vikāśas tu prītādiṣv api pañcasu |
GR14ruphbr_u:3862: bhayānake 'tha bībhatse kṣobho dhīrair udāhṛtaḥ || RBhrs_2,5.121 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3865: pratīyamānā apy ajñair grāmyaiḥ sapadi duḥkhavat |
GR14ruphbr_u:3866: karuṇādyā rasāḥ prājñaiḥ prauḍhānanda-mayā matāḥ || RBhrs_2,5.123 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3868: sad-uktyā ca sukhaṃ tebhyaḥ syāt suvyaktam iti sthitiḥ || RBhrs_2,5.124 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3870: karuṇādāv api rase jāyate yat paraṃ sukham |
GR14ruphbr_u:3871: sucetasām anubhavaḥ pramāṇaṃ tatra kevalam || RBhrs_2,5.125 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3875: prītyā rāmāyaṇaṃ nityaṃ hanumān śṛṇuyāt katham || RBhrs_2,5.127 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3877: sañcārī syāt samāno vā kṛṣṇa-ratyāḥ suhṛd-ratiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3878: adhikā puṣyamāṇā ced bhāvollāsā ratiḥ || RBhrs_2,5.128 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3881: ity eṣa bhakti-rasikaś caurād iva mahā-nidhiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3886: hṛdi sattvojjvale bāḍhaṃ svadate sa raso mataḥ || RBhrs_2,5.132 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3888: bhāvyate gāḍha-saṃskāraiś citte bhāvaḥ sa kathyate || RBhrs_2,5.133 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3901: sa mayi sanātana-mūrtis tanotu puruṣottamas tuṣṭim || RBhrs_3,1.1 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3903: mukhyo bhakti-rasaḥ pañcavidhaḥ śāntādīr īryate || RBhrs_3,1.2 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3905: athāmī pañca lakṣyante rasāḥ śāntādayaḥ kramāt || RBhrs_3,1.3 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3907: vakṣyamāṇair vibhāvādyaiḥ śamināṃ svādyatāṃ gataḥ sthāyī śānti-ratir dhīraiḥ śānta-bhakti-rasaḥ smṛtaḥ || RBhrs_3,1.4 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3908: prāyaḥ sva-sukha-jātīyaṃ sukhaṃ syād atra yoginām |
GR14ruphbr_u:3909: kintv ātma-saukhyam aghanaṃ ghanaṃ tv īśam ayaṃ sukham || RBhrs_3,1.5 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3913: caturbhujaś ca śāntāś ca asminn ālambanā matāḥ || RBhrs_3,1.7 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3917: yasmin gate nayanayoḥ pathi nirjihīte pratyak-padāt paramahaṃsa-muner mano 'pi || RBhrs_3,1.8
GR14ruphbr_u:3919: paramātmā paraṃ brahma śamo dāntaḥ śucir vaśī || RBhrs_3,1.9 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3921: vibhur ity ādi guṇavān asminn ālambano hariḥ || RBhrs_3,1.10 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3927: prādhānyāt sanakādīnāṃ rūpaṃ bhaktiś ca kathyate || RBhrs_3,1.12 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3932: samasta-guṇa-varjite karaṇataḥ pratīcīnatāṃ gate kim api vastuni svayam adīpi tāvat sukham
GR14ruphbr_u:3934: mukunda sukha-cid-ghanā tava babhūva sākṣāt-kṛtiḥ || RBhrs_3,1.14 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3937: anujjhita-mumukṣā ye bhajante te tu tāpasāḥ || RBhrs_3,1.15 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3941: hṛdi dhyāyaṃ dhyāyaṃ muhur iha mukundābhidham ahaṃ cidānandaṃ jyotiḥ kṣaṇam iva vineṣyāmi rajanīḥ || RBhrs_3,1.16 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3949: eṣv asādhāraṇāḥ proktā budhair uddīpanā amī || RBhrs_3,1.19 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3951: akleśāḥ kamala-bhuvaḥ praviśya goṣṭhīṃ kurvantaḥ śruti-śirasāṃ śrutiṃ śruta-jñāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3952: uttuṅgaṃ yad-uparasaṅgamāya raṅgaṃ yogīndrāḥ pulaka-bhṛto navāpy avāpuḥ || RBhrs_3,1.20 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3956: ityādy uddīpanā sādhāraṇās teṣāṃ kilāśritaiḥ || RBhrs_3,1.22 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3960: antar-gataḥ sva-vivareṇa cakāra teṣāṃ saṅkṣobham akṣara-juṣām api citta-tanvoḥ || RBhrs_3,1.23
GR14ruphbr_u:3964: harer dviṣy api na dveṣo nātibhaktiḥ priyeṣv api |
GR14ruphbr_u:3965: siddhatāyās tathā jīvan-mukteś ca bahu-mānitā || RBhrs_3,1.25 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3967: maunam ity ādayaḥ śītāḥ syur asādhāraṇāḥ kriyāḥ || RBhrs_3,1.26 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3971: citta-kandara-taṭīm anākulām asya nūnam avagāhate hariḥ || RBhrs_3,1.27 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3973: stavādayaś ca dāsādyaiḥ śītāḥ sādhāraṇāḥ kriyāḥ || RBhrs_3,1.28 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3977: yad idaṃ vadanāmbhojaṃ jṛmbhām avalambate bhavataḥ || RBhrs_3,1.29 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3981: pāñcajanya-janito dhvanir antaḥ kṣobhayan sapadi biddha-samādhiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3985: sāttvikās tu jvalanty eva na tu dīptā bhavanty amī || RBhrs_3,1.32 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3987: sañcārino 'tra nirvedo dhṛtir harṣo matiḥ smṛtiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3992: vṛthā gato bata ciraṃ kālaḥ || RBhrs_3,1.34 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3994: atra śānti-ratiḥ sthāyī samā sāndrā ca sā dvidhā || RBhrs_3,1.35 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3997: līlayā mayi labdhe 'sya babhūvotkampinī tanuḥ || RBhrs_3,1.36 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3999: sarvāvidyā-dhvaṃsato yaḥ samastād āvirbhūto nirvikalpe samādhau |
GR14ruphbr_u:4000: jāte sākṣād yādavendre sa vindan mayy ānandaḥ sāndratāṃ koṭidhāsīt || RBhrs_3,1.37 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4006: vilocana-camatkṛtiṃ kathaya kiṃ nu nirmāsyati || RBhrs_3,1.39 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4008: kṣetre kuroḥ kim api caṇḍakaroparāge sāndraṃ mahaḥ pathi vilocanayor yadāsīt |
GR14ruphbr_u:4010: na pratyag-ātmani mano ramate pureva || RBhrs_3,1.40 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4013: bhagavann adhikaṃ prayojanaṃ katarad brahma-vido 'pi vidyate || RBhrs_3,1.41 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4015: hṛṣṭaḥ kambu-pati-svanair bhuvi luṭhac-cīrāñcalaḥ sañcalan mūrdhnā ruddha-dṛg-aśrubhiḥ pulakito drāg eṣa līna-vrataḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4016: akṣṇor aṅganam añjana-tviṣi para-brahmaṇy avāpte mudā mudrābhiḥ prakaṭīkaroty avamatiṃ yogī svarūpa-sthitau || RBhrs_3,1.42 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4018: prathamaṃ jñāna-niṣṭho 'pi so 'traiva ratim udvahet || RBhrs_3,1.43 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4025: eṣa bhakti-rasānanda-nipuṇaḥ syād yathā śukaḥ || RBhrs_3,1.45 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4027: śānty-ākhyāyā rater atra svīkārān na virudhyate || RBhrs_3,1.46 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4029: tan-niṣṭhā durghaṭā buddher etāṃ śānta-ratiṃ vinā || RBhrs_3,1.47 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4031: nāsti yatra sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ na dveṣo na ca matsaraḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4032: samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu sa śāntaḥ prathito rasaḥ || RBhrs_3,1.48 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4036: śāntam eva rasaṃ pūrve prāhur ekam anekadhā || RBhrs_3,1.50 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4037: nirvedo viṣaye sthāyi tattva-jñānodbhavaḥ sa cet |
GR14ruphbr_u:4047: śāntatvenāyam evāddhā sudevādyaiś ca varṇitaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.2 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4049: nītā cetasi bhaktānāṃ prīti-bhakti-raso mataḥ || RBhrs_3,2.3 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4050: anugrāhyasya dāsatvāl lālyatvād apy ayaṃ dvidhā |
GR14ruphbr_u:4051: bhidyate sambhrama-prīto gaurava-prīta ity api || RBhrs_3,2.4 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4055: hariś ca tasya dāsāś ca jñeyā ālambanā iha || RBhrs_3,2.6 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4058: anyatra dvi-bhujaḥ kvāpi kutrāpy eṣu catur-bhujaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.7 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4060: navāmbudhara-bandhuraḥ kara-yugena vaktrāmbuje nidhāya muralīṃ sphurat-puraṭa-nindi paṭṭāmbaraḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:4062: prabhur divi divaukaso bhuvi dhinoti naḥ kiṅkarān || RBhrs_3,2.8 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4066: nava-ghana iva cañcalāpinaddho ravi-śaśi-maṇḍala-maṇḍitaś cakāsti || RBhrs_3,2.9 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4069: sakhyenojjvalitais tathā jalajayor āḍhyaś caturbhir bhujaiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4070: divyālaṅkaraṇena saṅkaṭa-tanuḥ saṅgī vihaṅgeśitur māṃ vyasmārayad eṣa kaṃsa-vijayī vaikuṇṭha-goṣṭhī-śriyam brahmāṇḍa-koṭi-dhāmaika-roma-kūpaḥ kṛpāmbudhiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4077: vadānyas tejasā yuktaḥ kṛtajñaḥ kīrti-saṃśrayaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.14 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4078: varīyān balavān prema-vaśya ity ādibhir guṇaiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4079: yutaś catur-vidheṣv eṣa dāseṣv ālambano hariḥ || RBhrs_3,2.15 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4084: prabhur ayam akhilair guṇair garīyān iha tulanām aparaḥ prayāti nāsya |
GR14ruphbr_u:4090: rūpaṃ prasiddham evaiṣāṃ tena bhaktir udīryate || RBhrs_3,2.19 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4092: kā paryety ambikeyaṃ harim avakalayan kampate kaḥ śiro 'sau
GR14ruphbr_u:4093: taṃ kaḥ stauty eṣa dhātā praṇamati viluṭhan kaḥ kṣitau vāsavo 'yam |
GR14ruphbr_u:4094: kaḥ stabdho hasyate 'ddhā danujabhid-anujaiḥ pūrvajo 'yaṃ mametthaṃ kālindī jāmbavatyāṃ tridaśa-paricayaṃ jāla-randhrād vyatānīt ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4096: te śaraṇyā jñāni-carāḥ sevā-niṣṭhās tridhāśritāḥ || RBhrs_3,2.21 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4098: kecid bhītāḥ śaraṇam abhitaḥ saṃśrayante bhavantaṃ vijñātārthās tvad-anubhavataḥ prāsya kecin mumukṣām |
GR14ruphbr_u:4099: śrāvaṃ śrāvaṃ tava nava-navāṃ mādhurīṃ sādhu-vṛndād
GR14ruphbr_u:4100: vṛndāraṇyotsava kila vayaṃ deva sevemahi tvām || RBhrs_3,2.22 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4106: bhaktair api durlabhayā yad ahaṃ pada-mudrayojjvalitaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.24 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4108: kāmādīnāṃ kati na katidhā pālitā durnideśās teṣāṃ jātā mayi na karuṇā na trapā nopaśāntiḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:4110: tvām āyātaḥ śaraṇam abhayaṃ māṃ niyuṅkṣvātma-dāsye || RBhrs_3,2.25 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4112: ye mumukṣāṃ parityajya harim eva samāśritāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4113: śaunaka-pramukhās te tu proktā jñāni-carāḥ budhaiḥ || RBhrs_3,2.26 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4117: sat-saṅgamākhyena sukhāvahena kṛtādya no yena kṛśā mumukṣā || RBhrs_3,2.27 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4119: dhyānātītaṃ kim api paramaṃ ye tu jānanti tattvaṃ teṣām āstāṃ hṛdaya-kuhare śuddha-cinmātra ātmā |
GR14ruphbr_u:4125: ikṣvākuḥ śrutadevāś ca puṇḍarīkādayaś ca te || RBhrs_3,2.29 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4128: śūnyodyāne nayati vihagān apy alaṃ bhikṣu-caryām |
GR14ruphbr_u:4129: ity utkarṣaṃ kam api sa-camatkāram ākarṇya citraṃ sevāyāṃ te sphuṭam aghahara śraddhayā gardhito 'smi || RBhrs_3,2.30 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4131: uddhavo dāruko jaitraḥ śrutadevaś ca śatrujit |
GR14ruphbr_u:4134: tathāpi kvāpy avasare paricaryāṃ ca kurvate |
GR14ruphbr_u:4143: tvayy evārpita-buddhir uddhava-mukhas tvat-pārṣadānāṃ gaṇo dvāri dvāravatī-purasya purataḥ sevotsukas tiṣṭhati || RBhrs_3,2.34 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4144: eteṣāṃ pravaraḥ śrīmān uddhavaḥ prema-viklavaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.35 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4149: mukhyaṃ pāriṣadeṣu bhakti-laharī-ruddhaṃ bhajāmy uddhavam || RBhrs_3,2.36
GR14ruphbr_u:4153: mantraṃ pṛcchati mām apeśala-dhiyaṃ vijñāna-vārāṃ nidhir vikrīḍaty asakṛd vicitra-caritaḥ so 'yaṃ prabhur mādṛśām || RBhrs_3,2.37
GR14ruphbr_u:4156: purasthāś ca vrajasthāś cety ucyate anugā dvidhā || RBhrs_3,2.38 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4161: upari kanaka-daṇḍaṃ maṇḍano vistṛṇīte dhuvati kila sucandraś cāmaraṃ candra-cārum |
GR14ruphbr_u:4167: ānandaś candrahāsaś ca payodo vakulas tathā |
GR14ruphbr_u:4168: rasadaḥ śāradādyāś ca vrajasthā anugā matāḥ || RBhrs_3,2.42 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4176: varair agurubhir jalaṃ racaya vāsitaṃ vārida |
GR14ruphbr_u:4178: parāga-paṭalī gavāṃ diśam arundha paurandarīm || RBhrs_3,2.44 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4179: vrajānugeṣu sarveṣu varīyān raktako mataḥ || RBhrs_3,2.45 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4190: dhūryo dhīraś ca vīraś ca tridhā pāriṣad-ādikaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.48 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4193: yaḥ prītiṃ tanute bhaktaḥ sa dhūrya iha kīrtyate || RBhrs_3,2.49 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4195: devaḥ sevyatayā yathā sphurati me devyas tathāsya priyāḥ sarvaḥ prāṇa-samānatāṃ pracinute tad-bhakti-bhājāṃ gaṇaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4196: smṛtvā sāhasikaṃ bibhemi tam ahaṃ bhaktābhimānonnataṃ prītiṃ tat-praṇate khare 'py avidadhad yaḥ svāsthyam ālambate ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4199: tasya prasāda-pātraṃ syān mukhyaṃ dhīraḥ sa ucyate || RBhrs_3,2.51 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4201: kam api pṛthag-anuccair nācarāmi prayatnaṃ yadukula-kamalārka tvat-prasāda-śriye 'pi |
GR14ruphbr_u:4205: kṛpāṃ tasya samāśritya prauḍhāṃ nānyam apekṣate |
GR14ruphbr_u:4206: atulāṃ yo vahan kṛṣṇe prītiṃ vīraḥ sa ucyate || RBhrs_3,2.53 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4208: pralamba-ripur īśvaro bhavatu kā kṛtis tena me
GR14ruphbr_u:4209: kumāra-makara-dhvajād api na kiñcid āste phalam |
GR14ruphbr_u:4211: priyā pariṣad-agrimāṃ na gaṇayāmi bhāmām api || RBhrs_3,2.54 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4213: jagaj-jananyāṃ jagad-īśa vaiśasaṃ syād eva yat-karmaṇi naḥ samīhitam karoṣi phalgv apy uru dīna-vatsalaḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:4214: sva eva dhiṣṇye 'bhiratasya kiṃ tayā || RBhrs_3,2.55 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4216: nitya-siddhāś ca siddhāś ca sādhakāḥ parikīrtitaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.56 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4220: ity ādayo vibhāvāḥ syur eṣv asādhāraṇā matāḥ || RBhrs_3,2.57 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4222: kṛṣṇasya paśyata kṛpāṃ kṛpādyāḥ kṛpaṇe mayi |
GR14ruphbr_u:4223: dhyeyo 'sau nidhane hanta dṛśor adhvānam abhyagāt || RBhrs_3,2.58 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4226: tad-aṅga-saurabhādyās tu sarvaiḥ sādhāraṇā matāḥ || RBhrs_3,2.59 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4230: citraṃ vāri-dharān vināpi tarasā yair adya dhārā-mayair
GR14ruphbr_u:4231: dūrāt paśyata deva-mātṛkam abhūd vṛndāṭavī-maṇḍalam || RBhrs_3,2.60 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4235: tan-niṣṭhādyāḥ śītāḥ syur eṣv asādhāraṇāḥ kriyāḥ || RBhrs_3,2.61 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4237: aṅga-stambhārambham uttuṅgayantaṃ premānandaṃ dāruko nābhyanandat kaṃsārāter vījane yena sākṣād akṣodīyān antarāyo vyadhāyi || RBhrs_3,2.62 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4239: virāgādyāś ca ye śītāḥ proktāḥ sādhāraṇās tu te || RBhrs_3,2.63 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4242: natvā munīṃś ca saṃhṛṣṭo dhunvan vāso nanarta ha || RBhrs_3,2.64 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4249: stambhādyāḥ sāttvikāḥ sarve prītādi-tritaye matāḥ || RBhrs_3,2.66 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4262: dainyaṃ cintā smṛtiḥ śaṅkā matir autsukya-cāpale || RBhrs_3,2.69 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4264: bodhaḥ svapnaḥ klamo vyādhir mṛtiś ca vyabhicāriṇaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.70 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4266: yoge trayaḥ syur dhṛty-antā ayoge tu klamādayaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4267: ubhayatra pare śeṣā nirvedādyāḥ satāṃ matāḥ || RBhrs_3,2.71 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4272: harim avalokya puro bhuvi patito daṇḍa-praṇāma-śata-kāmaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4273: pramada-vimugdho nṛpatiḥ punar utthānaṃ visasmāra || RBhrs_3,2.73 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4276: ādhis tad-virahe deva grīṣme sara ivāṃśumān || RBhrs_3,2.74 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4278: dhanyāḥ sphurati tava sūrya karāḥ sahasraṃ ye sarvadā yadupateḥ padayoḥ patanti |
GR14ruphbr_u:4279: bandhyo dṛśāṃ darśaśatī dhriyate mamāsau dūre muhūrtam api yā na vilokate tam || RBhrs_3,2.75
GR14ruphbr_u:4283: eṣā rase 'tra kathitā sthāyi-bhāvatayā budhaiḥ || RBhrs_3,2.76 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4285: tatra pāriṣadādes tu hetuḥ saṃskāra eva hi |
GR14ruphbr_u:4288: vṛddhiṃ premā tataḥ snehas tato rāga iti tridhā || RBhrs_3,2.78 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4290: mamādyāmaṅgalaṃ naṣṭaṃ phalavāṃś caiva me bhavaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4294: kadā namaskariṣāmi gopa-rūpaṃ tam īśvaram || RBhrs_3,2.80 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4300: naya māṃ vikṛtir na hi me tvat-pada-kamalāvalambasya || RBhrs_3,2.82 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4302: ruṣājvalita-buddhinā bhṛgu-sutena śapto 'py alaṃ mayā hṛta-jagat-trayo 'py atanu-kaitavaṃ tanvatā |
GR14ruphbr_u:4303: vinindya kṛta-bandhano 'py uraga-rāja-pāśair balād arajyata sa mayy aho dviguṇam eva vairocaniḥ atha snehaḥ--
GR14ruphbr_u:4304: sāndraś citta-dravaṃ kurvan premā sneha itīryate |
GR14ruphbr_u:4305: kṣaṇikasyāpi neha syād visleṣasya sahiṣṇutā || RBhrs_3,2.84 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4307: dambhena bāṣpāmbu-jharasya keśavaṃ vīkṣya dravac-cittam asusruvat tava |
GR14ruphbr_u:4308: ity uccakair dhārayato vicittatāṃ citrā na te dāruka dāru-kalpatā || RBhrs_3,2.85 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4310: patnīṃ ratna-nidheḥ parām upaharan pūreṇa bāṣpāmbhasāṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4312: cumban phulla-kadamba-ḍambara-tulāṅgaiḥ samīkṣyācyutaṃ stabdho 'py abhyadhikāṃ śriyaṃ praṇamatāṃ vṛndād dadhāroddhavaḥ ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4314: snehaḥ sa rāgo yena syāt sukhaṃ duḥkham api sphuṭam |
GR14ruphbr_u:4315: tat-sambandha-lave 'py atra prītiḥ prāṇa-vyayair api || RBhrs_3,2.87 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4317: gurur api bhujagād bhīs takṣakāt prājya-rājya-
GR14ruphbr_u:4318: cyutir atiśayinī ca prāya-caryā ca gurvī |
GR14ruphbr_u:4322: keśavasya karuṇā-lave 'pi ced bāḍavo 'pi kila ṣāḍavo mama |
GR14ruphbr_u:4325: prāya ādya-dvaye premā snehaḥ pāriṣadeṣv asau |
GR14ruphbr_u:4326: parīkṣiti bhaved-rāgo dāruke ca tathoddhave || RBhrs_3,2.90 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4328: asminn abhyudite bhāvaḥ prāyaḥ syāt sakhya-leśa-bhāk || RBhrs_3,2.91 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4332: ayoga-yogāv etasya prabhedau kathitāv ubhau || RBhrs_3,2.93 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4334: saṅgābhāvo harer dhīrair ayoga iti kathyate |
GR14ruphbr_u:4337: utkaṇṭhitaṃ viyogaś cety ayoge 'pi dvidhocyate || RBhrs_3,2.95 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4342: pakṣapātena tan-nāmni mṛge padme ca tad-dṛśi || RBhrs_3,2.97 ||

GR14ruphbr_u:4350: amūny adhanyāni dināntarāṇi hare tvad-ālokanam antareṇa |

GR14ruphbr_u:4356: mano mama manāg api kvacid anāpnuvan nirvṛtiṃ kṣaṇārdham api manyate vraja-mahendra varṣa-vrajam dainyaṃ, yathā tatraiva {*Karṇāmṛta? Not found in any of the three
GR14ruphbr_u:4363: laghur aghahara kīṭād apy ahaṃ kūṭa-karmā |
GR14ruphbr_u:4364: iti visadṛśatāpi prārthane prārthayāmi snapaya kṛpaṇa-bandho mām apāṅga-cchaṭābhiḥ || RBhrs_3,2.103
GR14ruphbr_u:4368: bhaven na hi yayoḥ padaṃ madhurima-śriyām āspadaṃ padāmbujanakhāṅkurād api visāri rocis tava cintām, yathā--

GR14ruphbr_u:4373: tvac-chaiśavaṃ tri-bhuvanādbhutam ity avehi mac-cāpalaṃ ca tava vā mama vādhigamyam |
GR14ruphbr_u:4377: hriyam aghahara muktvā dṛk-pataṅgī mamāsau bhayam api damayitvā bhakta-vṛndāt tṛṣārtā |
GR14ruphbr_u:4378: niravadhim avicārya svasya ca kṣodimānaṃ tava caraṇa-sarojaṃ leḍhum anivcchatīśa || RBhrs_3,2.107

GR14ruphbr_u:4384: tanuṃ bibhrad bhavyaḥ pratikṛtir ivāste dvija-patiḥ |

GR14ruphbr_u:4388: nadati kvacid utkaṇṭho vilajjo nṛtyati kvacit |

GR14ruphbr_u:4392: lasaty analasaṃ kvacit kvacid apārtham ārtāyate harer abhinavoddhura-praṇaya-sīdhum atto muniḥ moho, yathā hari-bhakti-sudhodaye--
GR14ruphbr_u:4401: kṣipata nanu satīrthāś ceṣṭatāṃ prāṇa-haṃsaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.113 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4410: adhṛtir jaḍatā vyādhir unmādo mūrcchitaṃ budhaiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4413: arāgitā tu sarvasminn adhṛtiḥ kathitā budhaiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4414: anye 'ṣṭau prakaṭārthatvāt tāpādyā na hi lakṣitāḥ || RBhrs_3,2.117 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4416: asmān dunoti kamalaṃ tapanasya mitraṃ ratnākaraś ca baḍavānala-gūḍha-mūrtiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4418: taṃ smārayan munipate dahatīha sabhyān || RBhrs_3,2.118 ||

GR14ruphbr_u:4437: svedāśrubhir na hi paraṃ jalatām avāpur aṅgāni niṣkriyatayā ca kiloddhavasya || RBhrs_3,2.123
GR14ruphbr_u:4439: cirayati maṇim anveṣṭuṃ calite murabhidi kuśasthalī-purataḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4443: proṣite bata nijādhidaivate raivate navam avekṣya nīradam |
GR14ruphbr_u:4449: vraja-bhuvi tathā nāsīn nidrā-lavo 'pi yathā purā |
GR14ruphbr_u:4451: satatam adhunā niśceṣṭāṅgās taṭāny adhiśerate || RBhrs_3,2.126 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4456: na kila vasatim ārtāḥ kartum icchanti haṃsāḥ || RBhrs_3,2.127 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4457: aśivatvān na ghaṭate bhakte kutrāpy asau mṛtiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4460: kṛṣṇena saṅgamo yas tu sa yoga iti kīrtyate |
GR14ruphbr_u:4461: yoge 'pi kathitaḥ siddhis tuṣṭiḥ sthitir iti tridhā || RBhrs_3,2.129 ||

GR14ruphbr_u:4465: mauliś candraka-bhūṣaṇo marakata-stambhābhirāmaṃ vapur vaktraṃ citra-vimugdha-hāsa-madhuraṃ bāle vilole dṛśau |
GR14ruphbr_u:4467: mandaṃ mandam aye ka eṣa mathurā-vīthīṃ mitho gāhate || RBhrs_3,2.131 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4472: jāte viyoge kaṃsāreḥ samprāptis tuṣṭir ucyate || RBhrs_3,2.133 ||

GR14ruphbr_u:4484: purastād ābhīrī-gaṇa-bhayada-nāmā sa kaṭhino maṇi-stambhālambī kuru-kula-kathāṃ saṅkalayitā

GR14ruphbr_u:4486: puras tasya niveśādyā yoge 'mīṣāṃ kriyā matāḥ || RBhrs_3,2.138 ||

GR14ruphbr_u:4495: niśamya karmāṇi guṇān atulyān vīryāṇi līlā-tanubhiḥ kṛtāni |

GR14ruphbr_u:4525: janayati janeṣu janaka-bhrāntiṃ yaḥ suṣṭhu rūpeṇa || RBhrs_3,2.152 ||

GR14ruphbr_u:4575: dviṣadbhiḥ kṣodiṣṭhair jagad-avihitecchasya bhavataḥ karād ākṛṣyaiva prasabham abhimanyāv api hate |

GR14ruphbr_u:4603: utkaṇṭhita-viyogādye yad yad vistāritaṃ na hi |

GR14ruphbr_u:4610: nītaś citte satāṃ puṣṭiṃ rasaḥ preyān udīryate || RBhrs_3,3.1 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4612: hariś ca tad-vayasyāś ca tasminn ālambanā matāḥ || RBhrs_3,3.2 ||

GR14ruphbr_u:4621: sakhyenojjvalitais tathā jalajayor āḍhyaṃ caturbhir bhujaiḥ |

GR14ruphbr_u:4627: sukhī varīyān ity ādyā guṇās tasyeha kīrtitā || RBhrs_3,3.7 ||

GR14ruphbr_u:4643: pada-kamalayoḥ sāsrau dasrātmajau ca nipetatus tam avaśādhiyaḥ prauḍhānandād arundhata pāṇḍavāḥ śreṣṭhaḥ pura-vayasyeṣu bhagavān vānaradhvajaḥ || RBhrs_3,3.13 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4657: ataḥ sarva-vayasyeṣu pradhānatvaṃ bhajanty amī || RBhrs_3,3.16 ||

GR14ruphbr_u:4665: ādhir vidhyati nas tvam arpaya kare kiṃ vā kṣaṇaṃ dakṣiṇe doṣṇas te karavāma kāmam adhunā savyasya saṃvāhanam || RBhrs_3,3.18 ||

GR14ruphbr_u:4680: sāyudhās tasya duṣṭebhyaḥ sadā rakṣā-parāyaṇāḥ || RBhrs_3,3.22 ||

GR14ruphbr_u:4685: dhunvan dhāvasi maṇḍalāgram amalaṃ tvaṃ maṇḍalībhadra kiṃ gurvīṃ nārya gadāṃ gṛhāṇa vijaya kṣobhaṃ vṛthā mā kṛthāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4686: śaktiṃ na kṣipa bhadravardhana puro govardhanaṃ gāhate garjann eṣa ghano balī na tu balīvardākṛtir dānavaḥ || RBhrs_3,3.24 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4693: sukhaṃ svapitu naḥ suhṛd vraja-niśānta-madhye niśi |

GR14ruphbr_u:4702: iti subala girā me sandiśa tvaṃ mukundaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4713: yad ugra-bhuja-saṅgare gurum agāt klamaṃ naḥ sakhā || RBhrs_3,3.32 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4714: sarveṣu sakhiṣu śreṣṭho devaprastho 'yam īritaḥ || RBhrs_3,3.33 ||

GR14ruphbr_u:4722: madhye sundari kandarasya padayoḥ saṃvāhanena priyaṃ devaprastha itaḥ kṛtī sukhayati premṇā vrajendrātmajam || RBhrs_3,3.35 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4725: śrīdāmā ca sudāmā ca dāmā ca vasudāmakaḥ || RBhrs_3,3.36 ||

GR14ruphbr_u:4732: kareṇa calatā dṛśau nibhṛtam etya rundhe paraḥ kṛśāṅgi sukhayanty amī priya-sakhāḥ sakhāyaṃ tava || RBhrs_3,3.39 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4733: eṣu priya-vayasyeṣu śrīdāmā pravaro mataḥ || RBhrs_3,3.40 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4740: tvaṃ naḥ projjhya kaṭhora yāmuna-taṭe kasmād akasmād gato

GR14ruphbr_u:4742: brūmaḥ satyam adarśane tava manāk kā dhenavaḥ ke vayaṃ kiṃ goṣṭhaṃ kim abhīṣṭam ity acirataḥ sarvaṃ viparyasyati || RBhrs_3,3.42
GR14ruphbr_u:4748: rādhā-sandeśa-vṛndaṃ kathayati subalaḥ paśya kṛṣṇasya karṇe śyāmā-kandarpa-lekhaṃ nibhṛtam upaharaty ujjvalaḥ pāṇi-padme |
GR14ruphbr_u:4749: pālī-tāmbūlam āsye vitarati caturaḥ kokilo mūrdhni dhatte
