GR14ruphbr_u:4767: dūtaḥ sameti sakhi yatra milaty adūre |
GR14ruphbr_u:4768: sāpatrapāpi kulajāpi pativratāpi kā vā vṛṣasyati na gopa-vṛṣaṃ kiśorī || RBhrs_3,3.49 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4774: tad iyam aghahara tvām eti sarvādhvanaiva || RBhrs_3,3.51 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4775: eteṣu ke 'pi śāstreṣu ke 'pi lokeṣu viśrutāḥ || RBhrs_3,3.52 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4776: nitya-priyāḥ sura-carāḥ sādhakāś ceti te tridhā |
GR14ruphbr_u:4777: kecid eṣu sthirā jātyā mantrivat tam upāsate || RBhrs_3,3.53 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4779: kecid ārjava-sāreṇa saralāḥ śīlayanti tam || RBhrs_3,3.54 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4782: saumyāḥ sūnṛtayā vācā dhanyā dhinvanti taṃ pare || RBhrs_3,3.55 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4783: evaṃ vividhayā sarve prakṛtyā madhurā amī |
GR14ruphbr_u:4793: kaumāraṃ vatsale vācyaṃ tataḥ saṅkṣipya likhyate || RBhrs_3,3.59 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4795: bibhrad veṇuṃ jaṭhara-paṭayoḥ śṛṅga-vetre ca kakṣe vāme pāṇau masṛṇa-kavalaṃ tat-phalāny aṅgulīṣu |
GR14ruphbr_u:4796: tiṣṭhan madhye sva-parisuhṛdo hāsayan narmabhiḥ svaiḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:4797: svarge loke miṣati bubhuje yajña-bhug bāla-keliḥ || RBhrs_3,3.60 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4799: ādyaṃ madhyaṃ tathā śeṣaṃ paugaṇḍaṃ ca tridhā bhavet || RBhrs_3,3.61 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4802: kambu-grīvodgamādyaṃ ca paugaṇḍe prathame sati || RBhrs_3,3.62 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4804: tundaṃ vindati te mukunda śanakair aśvattha-patra-śriyaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4805: kaṇṭhaṃ kambuvad ambujākṣa bhajate rekhā-trayīm ujjvalām |
GR14ruphbr_u:4807: lakṣmīr ādhunikī dhinoti suhṛdām akṣīṇi sā kāpy asau || RBhrs_3,3.63 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4815: karṇābhyāṃ karṇikāre dadhad alam urasā phulla-mallīka-mālyaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4816: nṛtyan dor-yuddha-raṅge naṭavad iha sakhīn nandayaty eṣa kṛṣṇaḥ ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4819: pārśvādy-aṅgaṃ suvalitaṃ paugaṇḍe sati madhyame || RBhrs_3,3.67 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4827: bhāṇḍīre krīḍanaṃ śailoddhāraṇādyaṃ ca ceṣṭitam || RBhrs_3,3.69 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4831: baddhoṣṇīṣaḥ puraṭa-rucinā paṭṭi-pāśena pārśve paśya krīḍan sukhayati sakhe mitra-vṛndaṃ mukundaḥ paugaṇḍa-madhya evāyaṃ harir dīvyan virājate |
GR14ruphbr_u:4835: aṃsayos tuṅgatety ādi paugaṇḍe carame sati || RBhrs_3,3.72 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4837: agre līlālaka-latikayālaṅkṛtaṃ bibhrad āsyaṃ cañcad-veṇī-śikhara-śikhayā cumbita-śreṇi-bimbaḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:4839: nyasyann eva priya-savayasāṃ gokulān nirjihīte || RBhrs_3,3.73 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4845: veṣaḥ keśava peśalaḥ subalam apy āghūrṇayaty adya te vikrāntaṃ kim uta svabhāva-mṛdulāṃ goṣṭhābalānāṃ tatim || RBhrs_3,3.75 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4849: dhūrtas tvaṃ yad avaiṣi hṛd-gatam ataḥ karṇe tava vyāhare keyaṃ mohanatā-samṛddhir adhunā godhuk-kumārī-gaṇe |
GR14ruphbr_u:4851: pañceṣur jagatāṃ jaye nija-dhurāṃ yatrārpayan mādyati || RBhrs_3,3.77 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4853: kaiśoraṃ pūrvam evoktaṃ saṅkṣepeṇocyate tataḥ || RBhrs_3,3.78 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4857: ukṣaty ambaka-cātakān smita-rasair dāmodarāmbhodhare śrīdāmā ramaṇīya-roma-kalikākīrṇāṅga-śākhī babhau || RBhrs_3,3.79 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4859: tena yauvana-śobhāsya neha kācit prapañcitā || RBhrs_3,3.80 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4862: sakhīn kevalam evedaṃ dhāmnā dhīman dhinoti naḥ || RBhrs_3,3.81 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4867: api nivahāḥ samam eva jāgrati sma || RBhrs_3,3.82 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4869: suhṛdo na hi yāta kātarā harim anveṣṭum itaḥ sutāṃ raveḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4874: pañcāsya paśya muditāḥ pañcāsya-pratimāṃ yayuḥ || RBhrs_3,3.84 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4878: madhuripum iha rādhā-veṣam udvīkṣya sākṣāt priya-sakhi subalo 'bhūd vismitaḥ sa-smitaś ca || RBhrs_3,3.85 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4891: prāyaḥ puraḥsaratvādyāḥ suhṛdām īritāḥ kriyāḥ || RBhrs_3,3.90 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4898: tābhiḥ keli-kalau sākṣāt sakhyuḥ pakṣa-parigrahaḥ || RBhrs_3,3.93 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4902: puras tauryatrikaṃ tasya gavāṃ sambhālana-kriyāḥ || RBhrs_3,3.95 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4904: etāḥ sādhāraṇā dāsair vayasyānāṃ kriyā matāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4905: pūrvokteṣv aparāś cātra jñeyā dhīrair yathocitam || RBhrs_3,3.96 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4907: niṣkrāmantaṃ nāgam unmathya kṛṣṇaṃ śrīdāmāyaṃ drāk pariṣvaktu-kāmaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4916: api guru-puras tvām utsaṅge nidhāya visaṅkaṭe
GR14ruphbr_u:4918: praṇayati tava skandhe cāsau bhujaṃ bhujagopamaṃ kva subala purā siddha-kṣetre cakatha kiyat-tapaḥ svara-bhedādi catuṣkaṃ, yathā--
GR14ruphbr_u:4930: rase preyasi bhāva-jñaiḥ kathitā vyabhicāriṇaḥ || RBhrs_3,3.102 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4931: tatrāyoge madaṃ harṣaṃ garvaṃ nidrāṃ dhṛtiṃ vinā |
GR14ruphbr_u:4932: yoge mṛtiṃ klamaṃ vyādhiṃ vināpasmṛti-dīnate || RBhrs_3,3.103 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4939: vimukta-sambhramā yā syād viśrambhātmā ratir dvayoḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4940: prāyaḥ samānayor atra sā sakhya-sthāyi-śabda-bhāk || RBhrs_3,3.105 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4942: eṣā sakhya-ratir vṛddhiṃ gacchantī praṇayaḥ kramāt |
GR14ruphbr_u:4943: premā snehas tathā rāga iti pañca-bhidoditā || RBhrs_3,3.106 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4946: garuḍāṅka guḍākeśas tvāṃ kadā parirapsyate || RBhrs_3,3.107 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4949: tad-gandhenāpy asaṃspṛṣṭā ratiḥ praṇaya ucyate || RBhrs_3,3.108 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4953: dadhat-pulakinaṃ harer adhi-śirodhi savyaṃ bhujaṃ samaskuruta pāṃśumān śirasi candrakān arjunaḥ || RBhrs_3,3.109 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4956: mukunda vasatir vane para-gṛhe ca dāsya-kriyā |
GR14ruphbr_u:4957: iyaṃ sphuṭam amaṅgalā bhavatu pāṇḍavānāṃ gatiḥ parantu vavṛdhe tvayi dvi-guṇam eva sakhyāmṛtam sneho, yathā śrī-daśame (10.15.18)--
GR14ruphbr_u:4959: gāyanti sma mahārāja sneha-klinna-dhiyaḥ śanaiḥ || RBhrs_3,3.111 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4963: yā prāg āsta sarasvatī drutam asau līnopakaṇṭha-sthale
GR14ruphbr_u:4964: yā nāsīd udagād dṛśoḥ pathi sadā nīrorudhāvātra sā || RBhrs_3,3.112 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4966: astreṇa duṣpariharā haraye vyakāri yā patri-paṅktir akṛpeṇa kṛpī-sutena |
GR14ruphbr_u:4967: utplutya gāṇḍiva-bhṛtā hṛdi gṛhyamāṇā jātāsya sā kusuma-vṛṣṭir ivotsavāya || RBhrs_3,3.113
GR14ruphbr_u:4971: vṛṣabhasya vṛṣārkajā marīcir divasārdhe 'pi babhūva kaumudīva || RBhrs_3,3.114 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4976: aghasya jaṭharānalāt phaṇi-hradasya ca kṣveḍato davasya kavalād api tvam avitātra yeṣām abhūḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4978: kathaṃ na viraha-jvarād avasitān sakhīn adya naḥ || RBhrs_3,3.116 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4979: atrāpi pūrvavat proktās tāpādyās tā daśā daśa || RBhrs_3,3.117 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4981: prapannāḥ bhāṇḍīre 'py adhika-śiśire caṇḍim abharaṃ tuṣāre 'pi prauḍhiṃ dinakara-sutā-srotasi gataḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4982: apūrvaḥ kaṃsāre subala-mukha-mitrāvalim asau balīyān uttāpas tava viraha-janmā jvalayati || kṛśatā--
GR14ruphbr_u:4983: tvayi prāpte kaṃsa-kṣitipati-vimokṣāya nagarīṃ gabhīrād ābhīrāvali-tanuṣu khedād anudinam
GR14ruphbr_u:4985: samīrasya ghrānādhvani pṛthulatā kevalam abhūt || RBhrs_3,3.119 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4988: tatrānuvṛttiṃ kila yādavendra nirvidya nidrā-madhupī mumoca || RBhrs_3,3.120 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4992: na hi bhrāmaṃ bhrāmaṃ bhajati caṭulaṃ tulam iva me nirālambaṃ cetaḥ kvacid api vilambaṃ lavam api || RBhrs_3,3.121 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4994: racayati nija-vṛttau pāśupālye nivṛttiṃ kalayati ca kalānāṃ vismṛtau yatna-koṭim |
GR14ruphbr_u:4995: kim aparam iha vācyaṃ jīvite 'py adya dhatte yaduvara virahāt te nārthitāṃ bandhu-vargaḥ jaḍatā--
GR14ruphbr_u:4999: sphurati suhṛdāṃ gaṇāḥ śikhara-jāta-vṛkṣā iva || RBhrs_3,3.123 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5002: yaduvīra taṭe viceṣṭate ciram ābhīra-kumāra-maṇḍalī || RBhrs_3,3.124 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5006: luṇṭhanti bhuvi śerate bata hasanti dhāvanty amī rudanti mathurā-pate kim api vallavānāṃ gaṇāḥ mūrcchitam--
GR14ruphbr_u:5007: dīvyatīha madhure mathurāyāṃ prāpya rājyam adhunā madhu-nāthe |
GR14ruphbr_u:5008: viśvam eva muditaṃ ruditāndhe gokule tu muhur ākulatābhūt || RBhrs_3,3.126 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5012: vāraṃ vāram akharva-locana-jalair āplāvya tān niścalān
GR14ruphbr_u:5013: śocanty adya yathā ciraṃ paricaya-snigdhāḥ kuraṅgā api || RBhrs_3,3.127 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5015: kṛṣṇena viprayogaḥ syān na jātu vraja-vāsinām || RBhrs_3,3.128 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5017: vatsair vatsatarībhiś ca sadā krīḍati mādhavaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5021: citrākāraṃ bhajann eva mitrākāram adarśayat || RBhrs_3,3.130 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5023: taṃ mātuleyaṃ parirabhya nirvṛto bhīmaḥ smayan prema-javākulendriyaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5024: yamau kirīṭī ca suhṛttamaṃ mudā prabṛddha-bāṣpaḥ parirebhire 'cyutam || RBhrs_3,3.131 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5033: sa eva yad-dṛg-viṣayaḥ svayaṃ sthitaḥ kiṃ varṇyate diṣṭam ato vrajaukasām || RBhrs_3,3.133
GR14ruphbr_u:5035: preyān kām api puṣṇāti rasaś citta-camatkṛtim || RBhrs_3,3.134 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5036: prīte ca vatsale cāpi kṛṣṇa-tad-bhaktayoḥ punaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5038: preyān eva bhavet preyān ataḥ sarva-raseṣv ayam |
GR14ruphbr_u:5044: vibhāvādyais tu vātsalyaṃ sthāyī puṣṭim upāgataḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5045: eṣa vatsala-nāmātra prokto bhakti-raso budhaiḥ || RBhrs_3,4.1 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5047: kṛṣṇaṃ tasya gurūṃś cātra prāhur ālambanān budhāḥ || RBhrs_3,4.2 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5055: dātety-ādi-guṇo kṛṣṇo vibhāva iti kathyate || RBhrs_3,4.4 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5059: trayyā copaniṣadbhiś ca sāṅkhya-yogaiś ca sātvataiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5062: viṣṇur nityam upāsyate sakhi mayā tenātra nītāḥ kṣayaṃ śaṅke pūtanikādayaḥ kṣiti-ruhau tau vātyayonmūlitau |
GR14ruphbr_u:5063: pratyakṣaṃ girir eṣa goṣṭa-patinā rāmeṇa sārdhaṃ dhṛtas
GR14ruphbr_u:5064: tat-tat-karma duranvayaṃ mama śiśoḥ kenāsya sambhāvyate || RBhrs_3,4.7 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5067: lālakatvādināpy atra vibhāvā guravo matāḥ || RBhrs_3,4.8 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5072: te tu tasyātra kathitā vraja-rājñī vrajeśvaraḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5073: rohiṇī tāś ca vallavyo yāḥ padmaja-hṛtātmajāḥ || RBhrs_3,4.10 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5080: rajjv-ākarṣa-śrama-bhuja-calat-kaṅkaṇau kuṇḍale ca svinnaṃ vaktraṃ kabara-vigalan-mālatī nirmamantha || RBhrs_3,4.12 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5085: śyāma-śyāma-rucir vicitra-sicayā goṣṭheśvarī pātu vaḥ || RBhrs_3,4.13 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5089: snuvānā pratyūṣe diśati ca bhuje kārmaṇam asau yaśodā mūrteva sphurati suta-vātsalya-paṭalī vrajādhīśasya rūpaṃ, yathā--
GR14ruphbr_u:5102: ādyaṃ madhyaṃ tathā śeṣaṃ kaumāraṃ tri-vidhaṃ matam || RBhrs_3,4.18 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5105: pravyakta-mārdavatvaṃ ca kaumāre prathame sati || RBhrs_3,4.19 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5109: nava-kuvalaya-komalaḥ kumāro mudam adhikāṃ vraja-nāthayor vyatānīt || RBhrs_3,4.20 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5115: kṣaṇam iha virudantaṃ smera-vaktraṃ kṣaṇaṃ sā tilam api viratāsīn nekṣituṃ goṣṭha-rājñī atra vyāghra-nakhaṃ kaṇṭhe rakṣā-tilaka-maṅgalam |
GR14ruphbr_u:5116: paṭṭa-ḍorī kaṭau haste sūtram ity ādi maṇḍanam || RBhrs_3,4.23 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5121: vrajeśa-gṛhiṇī sutaṃ na kila vīkṣya tṛptiṃ yayau || RBhrs_3,4.24 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5124: kalokti-riṅganādyaṃ ca kaumāre sati madhyame || RBhrs_3,4.25 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5129: tanayam amṛta-sindhau prekṣya mātā nyamāṅkṣīt || RBhrs_3,4.26 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5131: kiṅkiṇy-ādi ca kaṭyādau prasādhanam ihoditam || RBhrs_3,4.27 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5135: kara-dhṛta-navanīta-piṇḍam agre tanayam avekṣya nananda nanda-patnī || RBhrs_3,4.28 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5137: atra kiñcit kṛśaṃ madhyam īṣat-prathima-bhāg uraḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5138: śiraś ca kāka-pakṣāḍhyaṃ kaumāre carame sati || RBhrs_3,4.29 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5149: śikhaṇḍa-kṛta-śekharaḥ phaṇa-paṭīṃ dadhat kare ca laguḍīṃ laghuṃ savayasāṃ kulair āvṛtaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5150: avann iha śakṛt-karīn parisare vrajasya priye
GR14ruphbr_u:5151: sutas tava kṛtārthayaty ahaha paśya netrāṇi naḥ || RBhrs_3,4.33 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5153: paugaṇḍādi puraivoktaṃ tena saṅkṣipya likhyate || RBhrs_3,4.34 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5158: vraja-bhuvi mama vatsaḥ kacca-deśād upaiti || RBhrs_3,4.35 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5169: pārīr bhinatti vikiraty ajire dadhīni santānikāṃ harati kṛntati mantha-daṇḍam |
GR14ruphbr_u:5170: vahnau kṣipaty avirataṃ nava-nītam itthaṃ mātuḥ pramoda-bharam eva haris tanoti || RBhrs_3,4.39
GR14ruphbr_u:5172: prekṣya prekṣya diśaḥ sa-śaṅkam asakṛn mandaṃ padaṃ nikṣipan nāyāty eṣa latāntare sphuṭam ito gavyaṃ hariṣyan hariḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5174: trasyal-locanam asya śuṣyad-adharaṃ ramyaṃ didṛkṣe mukham || RBhrs_3,4.40
GR14ruphbr_u:5182: uduhya dorbhiḥ parirabhya mūrdhani ghrāṇair avāpuḥ paramāṃ mudaṃ te || RBhrs_3,4.42 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5186: kareṇa goṣṭheśitur aṅganeyam aṅgāni putrasya muhur mamārja || RBhrs_3,4.43 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5188: upālambhādayaś cātra mitraiḥ sādhāraṇāḥ kriyāḥ || RBhrs_3,4.44 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5190: navātra sāttvikāḥ stanya-srāvaḥ stambhādayaś ca te || RBhrs_3,4.45 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5195: matvā paraṃ brahma sutān apāyayan || RBhrs_3,4.46 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5200: tava navam abhiṣekaṃ dugdha-pūraiḥ karoti || RBhrs_3,4.47 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5202: katham api parirabdhuṃ na kṣamā stabdha-gātrī
GR14ruphbr_u:5204: na ca sutam upadeṣṭuṃ ruddha-kaṇṭhī samarthā dadhatam acalam āsīd vyākulā gokuleśā || RBhrs_3,4.48
GR14ruphbr_u:5217: ratiḥ saivātra vātsalyaṃ sthāyī bhāvo nigadyate || RBhrs_3,4.52 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5219: premavat snehavad bhāti kadācit kila rāgavat || RBhrs_3,4.53 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5222: mūrdhny upāghrāya paramāṃ mudaṃ lebhe kurūdvaha || RBhrs_3,4.54 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5226: gehād aṅganam aṅganāt punar asau gehaṃ viśanty ākulā govindasya muhur vrajendra-gṛhiṇī panthānam ālokate || RBhrs_3,4.55 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5230: kṛṣṇam aṅkam abhi gokuleśvarī prasnutā kuru-bhuvi nyavīviśat || RBhrs_3,4.56 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5232: devakyā vivṛta-prasū-caritayāpy unmṛjyamānānane bhūyobhir vasudeva-nandanatayāpy udghūṣyamāṇe janaiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5234: premā vallava-nāthayor atitarām ullāsam evāyayau || RBhrs_3,4.57 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5236: pīyūṣa-dyutibhiḥ stanādri-patitaiḥ kṣīrotkarair jāhnavī kālindī ca vilocanābja-janitair jātāñjana-śyāmalaiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5237: ārān-madhyama-vedim āpatitayoḥ klinnā tayoḥ saṅgame vṛttāsi vraja-rājñi tat-suta-mukha-prekṣāṃ sphuṭaṃ vāñchasi ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5241: sudhāmbudhir api sphuṭaṃ vikaṭa-kāla-kūṭaty alaṃ sthitā yadi na tatra te vadana-padmam udvīkṣyate atha ayoge utkaṇṭhitam, yathā--
GR14ruphbr_u:5247: bhrātas tanayaṃ bhrātur mama sandiśa gāndinī-putra |
GR14ruphbr_u:5248: bhrātṛvyeṣu vasantī didṛkṣate tvāṃ hare kuntī || RBhrs_3,4.61 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5254: paśya srasta-tanuḥ kaṭhora-luṭhanair dehe vraṇaṃ kurvatī |
GR14ruphbr_u:5255: kṣīṇā goṣṭha-mahī-mahendra-mahiṣī hā putra putrety asau krośantī karayor yugena kurute kaṣṭād uras-tāḍanam || RBhrs_3,4.63 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5256: bahūnām api sad-bhāve viyoge 'tra tu kecana |
GR14ruphbr_u:5258: unmāda-mohāv ity ādyā atyudrekaṃ vrajanty amī || RBhrs_3,4.64 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5260: manda-spandam abhūt klamair alaghubhiḥ sandānitaṃ mānasaṃ dvandvaṃ locanayoś cirād avicala-vyābhugna-tāraṃ sthitam |
GR14ruphbr_u:5261: niśvāsaiḥ sravad eva pākam ayate stanyaṃ ca taptair idaṃ nūnaṃ vallava-rājñi putra-virahodghūrṇābhir ākramyase || RBhrs_3,4.65 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5265: abhinava-vadhū-yuktaṃ cāmuṃ na harmyam aveśayaṃ śirasi kuliśaṃ hanta kṣiptaṃ śvaphalka-sutena me || RBhrs_3,4.66 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5267: dhig astu hata-jīvitaṃ niravadhi-śriyo 'py adya me yayā na hi hareḥ śiraḥ snuta-kucāgram āghrāyate |
GR14ruphbr_u:5268: sadā nava-sudhā-duhām api gavāṃ parārdhaṃ ca dhik sa luñcati na cañcalaḥ surabhi-gandhi yāsāṃ dadhi || RBhrs_3,4.67 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5270: yaḥ puṇḍarīkekṣaṇa tiṣṭhatas te goṣṭhe karāmbhoruha-maṇḍano 'bhūt |
GR14ruphbr_u:5271: taṃ prekṣya daṇḍa-stimitendriyād yad daṇḍākṛtis te jananī babhūva || RBhrs_3,4.68 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5273: yācate bata vidhātar udasrā tvāṃ radais tṛṇam udasya yaśodā |
GR14ruphbr_u:5274: gocare sakṛd api kṣaṇam adya matsaraṃ tyaja mamānaya vatsam || RBhrs_3,4.69 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5276: kim iva kurute harmye tiṣṭhann ayaṃ nirapatrapo vrajapatir iti brūte mugdho 'yam atra mudā janaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5277: ahaha tanayaṃ prāṇebhyo 'pi priyaṃ parihṛtya taṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5278: kaṭhina-hṛdayo goṣṭhe svairī praviśya sukhīyati || RBhrs_3,4.70 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5280: kva me putro nīpāḥ kathayata kuraṅgāḥ kim iha vaḥ sa babhrāmābhyarṇe bhaṇata tam udantaṃ madhukarāḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:5281: iti bhrāmaṃ bhrāmaṃ bhrama-bhara-vidūnā yadupate bhavantaṃ pṛcchantī diśi diśi yaśodā vicarati mohaḥ--
GR14ruphbr_u:5282: kuṭumbini manas taṭe vidhuratāṃ vidhatse kathaṃ prasāraya dṛśaṃ manāk tava sutaḥ puro vartate
GR14ruphbr_u:5283: idaṃ gṛhiṇi gṛhaṃ na kuru śūnyam ity ākulaṃ sa śocati tava prasūṃ yadu-kulendra nandaḥ pitā atha yoge siddhiḥ--
GR14ruphbr_u:5292: nayanayoḥ stanayor api yugmataḥ paripatadbhir asau payasāṃ jharaiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5298: kuca-kalasa-mukhābhyām ambara-knopam ambā tava muhur atiharṣād varṣati kṣīra-dhārām || RBhrs_3,4.76
GR14ruphbr_u:5299: svīkurvate rasam imaṃ nāṭya-jñā api kecana || RBhrs_3,4.77 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5301: sphuṭaṃ camatkāritayā vatsalaṃ ca rasaṃ viduḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5305: preyasas tu tirobhāvo vatsalaysāsya na kṣatiḥ || RBhrs_3,4.79 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5307: tatra keṣucid apy asyāḥ saṅkulatvam udīryate || RBhrs_3,4.80 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5309: yudhiṣṭhirasya vātsalyaṃ prītyā sakhyena cānvitam || RBhrs_3,4.81 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5315: evaṃ keṣucid anyeṣu vijñeyaṃ bhāva-miśraṇam || RBhrs_3,4.84 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5320: ātmocitair vibhāvādyaiḥ puṣṭiṃ nītā satāṃ hṛdi |
GR14ruphbr_u:5321: madhurākhyo bhaved bhakti-raso 'sau madhurā ratiḥ || RBhrs_3,5.1 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5323: rahasyatvāc ca saṃkṣipya vitatāṇgo vilikhyate || RBhrs_3,5.2 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5325: asmin ālambanaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ priyās tasya tu subhruvaḥ || RBhrs_3,5.3 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5328: āśrayatvena madhure harir ālambano mataḥ || RBhrs_3,5.4 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5332: svacchandaṃ vraja-sundarībhir abhitaḥ praty-aṅgam āliṅgitaḥ śṛṅgāraḥ sakhi mūrtimān iva madhau mugdho hariḥ krīḍati || RBhrs_3,5.5 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5336: nija-ramaṇatayā hariṃ bhajantiḥ praṇamata tāḥ paramādbhutāḥ kiśorīḥ || RBhrs_3,5.6 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5337: preyasīṣu harer āsu pravarā vārṣabhānavī || RBhrs_3,5.7 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5346: rādhā lāghavam apy anādara-girāṃ bhaṅgībhir ātanvatī maitrī-gauravato 'py asau śata-guṇāṃ mat-prītim evādadhe || RBhrs_3,5.9 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5349: rādhām ādhāya hṛdaye tatyāja vraja-sundarīḥ || RBhrs_3,5.10 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5355: vismārayati samastaṃ śiva śiva muralī murārāteḥ || RBhrs_3,5.12 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5362: krāntvā sapta jaganti samprati vayaṃ sarvordhvam adhyāsmahe ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5364: kāmaṃ vapuḥ pulakitaṃ nayane dhṛtāsre vācaḥ sa-gadgada-padāḥ sakhi kampi vakṣaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5365: jñātaṃ mukunda-muralī-rava-mādhurī te cetaḥ sudhāṃśu-vadane taralīkaroti || RBhrs_3,5.15 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5367: ālasyaugrye vinā sarve vijñeyā vyabhicāriṇaḥ || RBhrs_3,5.16 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5369: mā muñca pañcaśara pañca-śarīṃ śarīre mā siñca sāndra-makaranda-rasena vāyo |
GR14ruphbr_u:5371: nālambituṃ katham api kṣamate 'dya jīvaḥ || RBhrs_3,5.17 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5378: sthāyī bhāvo bhavaty atra pūrvoktā madhurā ratiḥ || RBhrs_3,5.19 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5384: rādhā-mādhavayor eva kvāpi bhāvaiḥ kadāpy asau |
GR14ruphbr_u:5387: ito dūre rājñī sphurati parito mitra-paṭalī
GR14ruphbr_u:5388: dṛśor agre candrāvalir upari śailasya danujaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5390: anta-śrīr lolā taḍid iva mukundasya valate || RBhrs_3,5.22 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5391: ghorā khaṇḍita-śaṅkhacūḍam ajiraṃ rundhe śivā tāmasī
GR14ruphbr_u:5394: rādhāyās tad api praphullam abhajan mlāniṃ na bhāvāmbujam || RBhrs_3,5.23
GR14ruphbr_u:5397: sa pūrva-rāgo mānaś ca pravāsādi-mayas tathā |
GR14ruphbr_u:5398: vipralambho bahu-vidho vidvadbhir iha kathyate || RBhrs_3,5.25 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5400: prāg-asaṅgatayor bhāvaḥ pūrva-rāgo bhaved dvayoḥ || RBhrs_3,5.26 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5402: akasmād ekasmin pathi sakhi mayā yāmuna-taṭaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5404: sa dṛg-bhaṅgyā kiṃ vākuruta na hi jāne tata idaṃ mano me vyālolaṃ kvacana gṛha-kṛtyo na lagate yathā śrī-daśame (10.53.2)--
GR14ruphbr_u:5405: yathā vinidrā yac cittā rukmiṇī kamalekṣaṇā |
GR14ruphbr_u:5406: tathāham api tac-citto nidrāṃ ca na labhe niśi |
GR14ruphbr_u:5407: vedāhaṃ rukmiṇyā dveṣān mamodvāho nivāritaḥ || RBhrs_3,5.28 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5414: mukhara-nikhare līnā dīnāpy uvāca rahaḥ sakhīm || RBhrs_3,5.30 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5424: na bhuṅkte na svapiti ca cintayan vo hy aharniśam || RBhrs_3,5.33 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5426: dvayor militayor bhogaḥ sambhoga iti kīrtyate || RBhrs_3,5.34 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5444: tanutāṃ sanātanātmā bhagavān mayi sarvadā tuṣṭim || RBhrs_4,1.1 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5446: rasaḥ sapta-vidho gauṇo maitrī-vaira-sthitir mithaḥ || RBhrs_4,1.2 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5447: rasābhāsāś ca tenātra laharyo nava kīrtitāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5448: prāg atrāniyatādhārāḥ kadācit kvāpy uditvarāḥ || RBhrs_4,1.3 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5449: gauṇā bhakti-rasāḥ sapta lekhyā hāsyādayaḥ kramāt || RBhrs_4,1.4 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5450: bhaktānāṃ pañcadhoktānām eṣāṃ madhyata eva hi |
GR14ruphbr_u:5451: kvāpy ekaḥ kvāpy anekaś ca gauṇeṣv ālambano mataḥ || RBhrs_4,1.5 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5454: hāsya-bhakti-raso nāma budhair eṣa nigadyate || RBhrs_4,1.6 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5456: vṛddhāḥ śiśu-mukhāḥ prāyaḥ proktā dhīrais tad-āśrayāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5457: vibhāvanādi-vaiśiṣṭyāt pravarāś ca kvacin matāḥ || RBhrs_4,1.7 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5459: yāsyāmy asya na bhīṣaṇasya savidhaṃ jīrṇasya śīrṇākṛter mātar neṣyati māṃ pidhāya kapaṭād ādhārikāyām asau |
GR14ruphbr_u:5460: ity uktvā cakitākṣam adbhuta-śiśāv udvīkṣyamāṇe harau hāsyaṃ tasya niruddhato 'py atitarāṃ vyaktaṃ tadāsīn muneḥ || RBhrs_4,1.8
GR14ruphbr_u:5462: yac ceṣṭā kṛṣṇa-viṣayā proktaḥ so 'tra tad-anvayī || RBhrs_4,1.9 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5464: dadāmi dadhi-phāṇitaṃ vivṛṇu vaktram ity agrato niśamya jaratī-giraṃ vivṛta-komalauṣṭhe sthite
GR14ruphbr_u:5465: tayā kusumam arpitaṃ navam avetya bhugnānane harau jahasur uddhuraṃ kim api suṣṭhu goṣṭhārbhakāḥ yathā vā--
GR14ruphbr_u:5466: asya prekṣya karaṃ śiśor munipate śyāmasya me kathyatāṃ tathyaṃ hanta cirāyur eṣa bhavitā kiṃ dhenu-koṭīśvaraḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5467: ity ukte bhagavan mayādya paritaś cīreṇa kiṃ cāruṇā drāg āvirbhavad-uddhura-smitam idaṃ vaktraṃ tvayā rudhyate || RBhrs_4,1.11
GR14ruphbr_u:5472: ṣoḍhā hāsa-ratiḥ syāt smita-hasite vihasitāvahasite ca |
GR14ruphbr_u:5473: apahasitātihasitake jyeṣṭhādīnāṃ kramād dve dve || RBhrs_4,1.14 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5475: bhaved vihasitādyaṃ ca bhāvajñair iti bhaṇyate || RBhrs_4,1.15 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5479: kva yāmi jaratī khalā dadhi-haraṃ didhīrṣanty asau pradhāvati javena māṃ subala maṅkṣu rakṣāṃ kuru |
GR14ruphbr_u:5481: vikasvara-mukhāmbujaṃ kulam abhūn munīnāṃ divi || RBhrs_4,1.17 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5483: tad eva dara-saṃlakṣya-dantāgraṃ hasitaṃ bhavet || RBhrs_4,1.18 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5485: mad-vaśena puraḥ-sthito harir asau putro 'ham evāsmi te paśyety acyuta-jalpa-viśvasitayā saṃrambha-rajyad-dṛśā |
GR14ruphbr_u:5486: mām eti skhalad-akṣare jaṭilayā vyākruśya niṣkāsite
GR14ruphbr_u:5487: putre prāṅgataḥ sakhī-kulam abhūd dantāṃśu-dhautādharam || RBhrs_4,1.19 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5489: sa-svanaṃ dṛṣṭa-daśanaṃ bhaved vihasitaṃ tu tat || RBhrs_4,1.20 ||

GR14ruphbr_u:5498: lagnas te nitarāṃ dṛśor api yuge kiṃ dhātu-rāgo ghanaḥ prātaḥ putra balasya vā kim asitaṃ vāsas tvayāṅge dhṛtam |
GR14ruphbr_u:5500: dūtī saṅkucad-īkṣaṇāvahasitaṃ jātā na roddhuṃ kṣamā || RBhrs_4,1.23 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5507: jaratyāḥ prastobhān naṭati tad anaiṣīd dṛśam asau || RBhrs_4,1.25 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5509: sahasra-tālaṃ kṣiptāṅgaṃ tac cātihasitaṃ viduḥ || RBhrs_4,1.26 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5511: vṛddhe tvaṃ valitānanāsi valibhiḥ prekṣya suyogyām atas tvām udvoḍhum asau balī-mukha-varo māṃ sādhayaty utsukaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5512: ābhir vipluta-dhīr vṛṇe na hi paraṃ tvatto bali-dhvaṃsanād
GR14ruphbr_u:5513: ity uccair mukharā-girā vijahasuḥ sottālikā bālikāḥ || RBhrs_4,1.27 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5514: yasya hāsaḥ sa cet kvāpi sākṣān naiva nibadhyate |
GR14ruphbr_u:5517: śimbī-lambi-kucāsi dardura-vadhū-vispardhi nāsākṛtis tvaṃ jīryad-duli-dṛṣṭir oṣṭha-tulitāṅgārā mṛdaṅgodarī |
GR14ruphbr_u:5518: kā tvattaḥ kuṭile parāsti jaṭilā-putri kṣitau sundarī puṇyena vraja-subhruvāṃ tava dhṛtiṃ hartuṃ na vaṃśī kṣamā || RBhrs_4,1.29
GR14ruphbr_u:5526: sā vismaya-ratir nītād- bhuto-bhakti-raso bhavet || RBhrs_4,2.1 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5533: sākṣād anumitaṃ ceti tac ca dvividham ucyate || RBhrs_4,2.4 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5542: citraṃ bataitad ekena vapuṣā yugapat pṛthak |
GR14ruphbr_u:5543: gṛheṣu dvy-aṣṭa-sāhasraṃ striya eka udāvahat || RBhrs_4,2.7 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5548: khelann iva sphurati hanta kim indra-jālam || RBhrs_4,2.8 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5550: yāny akṣipan praharaṇāni bhaṭāḥ sa devaḥ pratyekam acchinadamuni śara-trayeṇa |
GR14ruphbr_u:5551: ity ākalayya yudhi kaṃsaripoḥ prabhāvaṃ sphārekṣaṇaḥ kṣitipatiḥ pulakī tadāsīt || RBhrs_4,2.9
GR14ruphbr_u:5553: ḍimbāḥ svarṇa-nibhāmbarā ghana-ruco jātāś caturbāhavo vatsāś ceti vadan kṛto 'smi vivaśaḥ stambha-śriyā paśyata |
GR14ruphbr_u:5554: āścaryaṃ kathayāmi vaḥ śṛṇuta bhoḥ pratyekam ekaikaśaḥ stūyante jagad-aṇḍavadbhir abhitas te hanta padmāsanaiḥ || RBhrs_4,2.10 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5556: unmīlya vraja-śiśavo dṛśaṃ purastād bhāṇḍīraṃ punar atulya vilokayantaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5559: apriyādeḥ kriyā kuryān nālaukiky api vismayam |
GR14ruphbr_u:5560: asādhāraṇy api manāk karoty eva priyasya sā || RBhrs_4,2.12 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5562: ity atra vismaye proktā raty-anugraha-mādhurī || RBhrs_4,2.13 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5570: ālambana iha prokta eṣa eva caturvidhaḥ || RBhrs_4,3.2 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5571: utsāhas tv eṣa bhaktānāṃ sarveṣām eva sambhavet || RBhrs_4,3.3 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5574: sakhā bandhu-viśeṣo vā yuddha-vīra ihocyate || RBhrs_4,3.4 ||

GR14ruphbr_u:5578: aparājita-māninaṃ haṭhāc caṭulaṃ tvām abhibhūya mādhava |
GR14ruphbr_u:5580: yadi na tvaṃ samarāt parāñcasi || RBhrs_4,3.6 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5585: śrīdāmnaś ca bakī-dviṣaś ca samarāṭopaḥ paṭīyān abhūt || RBhrs_4,3.7 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5588: tathādya laguḍaṃ kramād bhramayati sma dāmā kṛtī |
GR14ruphbr_u:5595: jigāya bharata-śreṣṭhaṃ kuntyāḥ pramukhato vibhuḥ || RBhrs_4,3.10 || iti |
GR14ruphbr_u:5597: pratiyodha-sthitāḥ santo bhavanty uddīpanā iha || RBhrs_4,3.11 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5599: piṇḍīśūras tvam iha subalaṃ kaitavenābalāṅgaṃ jitvā dāmodara yudhi vṛthā mā kṛthāḥ katthitāni
GR14ruphbr_u:5601: mandradhvāno naṭati nikaṭe stokakṛṣṇaḥ kalāpī || RBhrs_4,3.12 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5607: protsāhayasyatitarāṃ kim ivāgraheṇa māṃ keśisūdana vidann api bhadrasenam |
GR14ruphbr_u:5608: yoddhuṃ balena samam atra sudurbalena divyārgalā pratibhaṭas trapate bhujo me || RBhrs_4,3.15
GR14ruphbr_u:5610: dhṛtāṭope gopeśvara-jaladhi-candre parikaraṃ nibadhnaty ullāsād bhuja-samara-caryā-samucitam
GR14ruphbr_u:5611: sa-romāñcaṃ kṣveḍā-niviḍa-mukha-bimbasya naṭataḥ sudāmnaḥ sotkaṇṭhaṃ jayati muhur āhopuruṣikā catuṣṭaye 'pi vīrāṇāṃ nikhilā eva sāttvikāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5616: jigīṣā stheyasī yuddhe sā yuddhotsāha īryate || RBhrs_4,3.18 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5624: mā tvaṃ bhaiṣīḥ kṣudra re bhadrasena |
GR14ruphbr_u:5625: helārambheṇādya nirjitya rāmaṃ śrīdāmāhaṃ kṛṣṇam evāhvayeya || RBhrs_4,3.20 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5627: balasya balino balāt suhṛd-anīkam āloḍayan payodhim iva mandaraḥ kṛta-mukunda-pakṣa-grahaḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:5629: hareḥ pramadam ekakaḥ samiti bhadraseno vyadhāt || RBhrs_4,3.21 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5638: sāhāyyam atra subalaḥ kurute balī cej jāto maṇiḥ sujaṭito vara-hāṭakena || RBhrs_4,3.23 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5639: suhṛd eva pratibhaṭo vīre kṛṣṇasya na tvariḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5640: sa bhakta-kṣobha-kāritvād raudre tv ālambano rase |

GR14ruphbr_u:5646: sahasā dīyate yena svayaṃ sarvasvam apy uta |
GR14ruphbr_u:5647: dāmodarasya saukhyāya procyate sa bahu-pradaḥ || RBhrs_4,3.26 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5653: pragāḍhā stheyasī ditsā dānotsāha itīryate || RBhrs_4,3.29 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5654: dvidhā bahu-prado 'py eṣa vidvadbhir iha kathyate |
GR14ruphbr_u:5655: syād ābhyudayikas tv ekaḥ paras tat-sampradānakaḥ || RBhrs_4,3.30 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5658: arthibhyo brāhmaṇādibhyaḥ sa ābhyudāyiko bhavet || RBhrs_4,3.31 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5660: vrajapatir iha sūnor jātakārthaṃ tathāsau vyatarad amala-cetāḥ sañcayaṃ naicikīnām |
GR14ruphbr_u:5661: pṛthur api nṛga-kīrtiḥ sāmprataṃ saṃvṛtāsīd iti nijagadur uccair bhūsurā yena tṛptāḥ || atha tat-sampradānakaḥ--
GR14ruphbr_u:5663: sarvasvaṃ dīyate yena sa syāt tat-sampradānakaḥ || RBhrs_4,3.33 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5664: tad-dānaṃ prīti-pūjābhyāṃ bhaved ity uditaṃ dvidhā || RBhrs_4,3.34 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5666: prīti-dānaṃ tu tasmai yad dadyād bandhv-ādi-rūpiṇe || RBhrs_4,3.35 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5668: cārcikyaṃ vaijayantīṃ paṭam uru-puraṭodbhāsuraṃ bhūṣaṇānāṃ śreṇiṃ māṇikya-bhājaṃ gaja-ratha-turagān karburān karbureṇa |
GR14ruphbr_u:5669: dattvā rājyaṃ kuṭumbaṃ svam api bhagavate ditsur apy anyad uccair deyaṃ kutrāpy adṛṣṭvā makha-sadasi tadā vyākulaḥ pāṇḍavo 'bhūt ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5671: pujā-dānaṃ tu tasmai yad vipra-rūpāya dīyate || RBhrs_4,3.37 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5673: yajanti yajñaṃ kratubhir yam ādṛtā bhavanta āmnāya-vidhāna-kovidāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5674: sa eva viṣṇur varado 'stu vā paro dāsyāmy amuṣmai kṣitim īpsitāṃ mune || RBhrs_4,3.38 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5677: balinaiva sa yenāsya bhikṣā-pātrīkṛtaḥ karaḥ || RBhrs_4,3.39 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5680: hariṇā dīyamāno 'pi sārṣṭy-ādis tuṣyatā varaḥ || RBhrs_4,3.40 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5684: atra sañcāritā bhūmnā dhṛter eva samīkṣyate || RBhrs_4,3.42 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5686: tyāgecchā tādṛśī prauḍhā tyāgotsāha itīryate || RBhrs_4,3.43 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5691: svāmin kṛtārtho 'smi varaṃ na yāce || RBhrs_4,3.44 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5693: nātyantikaṃ vigaṇayanty api te prasādaṃ kiṃ vānyad arpita-bhayaṃ bhruva unnayais te |
GR14ruphbr_u:5694: ye 'ṅga tvad-aṅghri-śaraṇā bhavataḥ kathāyāḥ kīrtanya-tīrtha-yaśasaḥ kuśalā rasa-jñāḥ || ayam eva bhavann uccaiḥ prauḍha-bhāva-viśeṣa-bhāk |
GR14ruphbr_u:5695: dhuryādīnāṃ tṛtīyasya vīrasya padavīṃ vrajet || RBhrs_4,3.46 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5701: āśvāsanoktayaḥ sthairyam ity ādyās tatra vikriyāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5702: autsukyam atiharṣādyā jñeyāḥ sañcāriṇo budhaiḥ || RBhrs_4,3.49 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5706: vande kuṭmalitāñjalir muhur ahaṃ vīraṃ mayūra-dhvajaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5709: sollāsaṃ krakacena dāritam abhūt patnī-sutābhyāṃ śivaḥ || RBhrs_4,3.51 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5710: hareś cet tattva-vijñānaṃ naivāsya ghaṭate dayā |
GR14ruphbr_u:5711: tad-abhāve tv asau dāna-vīre 'ntar-bhavati sphuṭam || RBhrs_4,3.52 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5713: kṛtātra dvija-rūpe ca bhaktis tenāsya bhaktatā || RBhrs_4,3.53 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5715: vopadevādayo dhīrā vīram ācakṣate tridhā || RBhrs_4,3.54 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5718: prāyeṇa dhīra-śāntas tu dharma-vīraḥ sa ucyate || RBhrs_4,3.55 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5722: dharmaikābhiniveśas tu dharmotsāho mataḥ satām || RBhrs_4,3.57 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5726: danuja-damana tasyāḥ pāṇḍu-putreṇa gaṇḍaḥ suciram araci śacyāḥ savya-hastāṅka-śāyī || RBhrs_4,3.58
GR14ruphbr_u:5728: dhyātvendrādy-āśrayatvena yad eṣv āhutir arpyate || RBhrs_4,3.59 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5729: ayaṃ tu sākṣāt tasyaiva nideśāt kurute makhān |
GR14ruphbr_u:5732: dharma-vīraṃ na manyante katicid dhanikādayaḥ* || RBhrs_4,3.61 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5737: ātmocitair vibhāvādyair nītā puṣṭiṃ satāṃ hṛdi |
GR14ruphbr_u:5738: bhavec choka-ratir bhakti-raso hi karuṇābhidhaḥ || RBhrs_4,4.1 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5740: aniṣṭāpteḥ padatayā vedyaḥ kṛṣṇo 'sya ca priyaḥ || RBhrs_4,4.2 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5742: ity asya viṣayatvena jñeyā ālambanās tridhā || RBhrs_4,4.3 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5743: tat-tad-vedī ca tad-bhakta āśrayatvena ca tridhā |
GR14ruphbr_u:5752: uktā śoka-ratiḥ saiva sthāyī bhāva ihocyate || RBhrs_4,4.7 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5761: nikhila-karaṇa-vṛtti-stambhinīm ālalambe viṣam agatim avasthāṃ goṣṭha-rājasya rājñī || RBhrs_4,4.9
GR14ruphbr_u:5764: nīlāmbarasya vaktrendur nīlimānaṃ muhur dadhe || RBhrs_4,4.10 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5769: sa devarṣir muktān api tanu-bhṛtaḥ śocati bhṛśam || RBhrs_4,4.11 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5771: mātar mādri gatā kutas tvam adhunā hā kvāsi pāṇḍo pitaḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:5772: sāndrānanda-sudhābdhir eṣa yuvayor nābhūd dṛśāṃ gocaraḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5773: ity uccair nakulānujo vilapati prekṣya pramodākulo govindasya padāravinda-yugala-proddāma-kānti-cchaṭām ratiṃ vināpi ghaṭate hāsyāder udgamaḥ kvacit |
GR14ruphbr_u:5774: kadācid api śokasya nāsya sambhāvanā bhavet || RBhrs_4,4.13 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5775: rater bhūmnā kraśimnā ca śoko bhūyān kṛśaś ca saḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5776: ratyā sahāvinā-bhāvāt kāpy etasya viśiṣṭatā || RBhrs_4,4.14 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5780: ataḥ prādurbhavan śoko labdhāpy udbhaṭatāṃ muhuḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5781: durūhām eva tanute gatiṃ saukhyasya kām api || RBhrs_4,4.16 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5787: kṛṣṇo hito 'hitaś ceti krodhasya viṣayas tridhā |
GR14ruphbr_u:5789: bhaktāḥ sarva-vidhā eva hite caivāhite tathā || RBhrs_4,5.2 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5791: sakhī-krodhe bhavet sakhyāḥ kṛṣṇād atyāhite sati || RBhrs_4,5.3 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5793: antaḥ-kleśa-kalaṅkitāḥ kila vayaṃ yāmo 'dya yāmyāṃ purīṃ nāyaṃ vañcana-sañcaya-praṇayinaṃ hāsaṃ tathāpy ujjhati |
GR14ruphbr_u:5795: hā medhāvini rādhike tava kathaṃ premā garīyān abhūt || RBhrs_4,5.4 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5797: krodho jaratyā vadhv-ādi-sambandhe prekṣite harau || RBhrs_4,5.5 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5799: are yuvati-taskara prakaṭam eva vadhvāḥ paṭas tavorasi nirīkṣyate bata na neti kiṃ jalpasi
GR14ruphbr_u:5800: aho vraja-nivāsinaḥ śṛṇuta kiṃ na vikrośanaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5803: sarveṣām eva govinde ratiḥ prauḍhā virājate || RBhrs_4,5.7 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5805: hitas tridhānavahitaḥ sāhasī cerṣyur ity api || RBhrs_4,5.8 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5808: kvacit tatra pramatto yaḥ prokto 'navahito 'tra saḥ || RBhrs_4,5.9 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5810: uttiṣṭha mūḍha kuru mā vilambaṃ vṛthaiva dhik paṇḍita-māninī tvam |
GR14ruphbr_u:5811: kraṭyat-palāśi-dvayam antarā te baddhaḥ suto 'sau sakhi bambhramīti || RBhrs_4,5.10 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5813: yaḥ prerako bhaya-sthāne sāhasī sa nigadyate || RBhrs_4,5.11 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5815: govindaḥ priya-suhṛdāṃ giraiva yātas tālānāṃ vipinam iti sphuṭaṃ niśamya |
GR14ruphbr_u:5816: bhrū-bheda-sthapuṭita-dṛṣṭir ādyam eṣāṃ ḍimbhānāṃ vraja-pati-gehinī dadarśa || RBhrs_4,5.12
GR14ruphbr_u:5825: ahitaḥ syād dvidhā svasya hareś ceti prabhedataḥ || RBhrs_4,5.15 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5827: ahitaḥ svasya sa syād yaḥ kṛṣṇa-sambandha-bādhakaḥ || RBhrs_4,5.16 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5831: iti uttuṅgā mama madhu-pure yātrayā tatra tāsāṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5834: ahitas tu hares tasya vairi-pakṣo nigadyate || RBhrs_4,5.18 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5838: ayaṃ kṣipati pāṇḍavaḥ śamana-daṇḍa-ghoraṃ haṭhāt trir asya mukuṭopari sphuṭam udīrya savyaṃ padam || RBhrs_4,5.19 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5840: kṛṣṇāhita-hitasthāḥ syur amī uddīpanā iha || RBhrs_4,5.20 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5846: atra stambhādayaḥ sarve prākaṭyaṃ yānti sāttvikāḥ || RBhrs_4,5.23 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5849: atra krodha-ratiḥ sthāyī sa tu krodhas tridhā mataḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5850: kopo manyus tathā roṣas tatra kopas tu śatru-gaḥ || RBhrs_4,5.25 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5852: roṣas tu dayite strīṇām ato vyabhicaraty asau || RBhrs_4,5.26 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5854: dṛg-anta-pāṭalatvādyā roṣe tu kathitāḥ kriyāḥ || RBhrs_4,5.27 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5857: mṛdhe magadha-bhūpatau kim api vaktram ākrośati |
GR14ruphbr_u:5860: {*Three syllables missing in the last line. Copyist error or typo?}
GR14ruphbr_u:5862: krośantyāṃ kara-pallavena balavān sadyaḥ pidhatte mukhaṃ dhāvantyāṃ bhaya-bhāji vistṛta-bhujo rundhe puraḥ paddhatim |
GR14ruphbr_u:5863: pādānte viluṭhaty asau mayi muhur daṣṭādharāyāṃ ruṣā mātaś caṇḍi mayā śikhaṇḍa-mukuṭād ātmābhirakṣyaḥ katham || RBhrs_4,5.29 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5865: jvalati durmukhi marmaṇi murmuras tava girā jaṭile niṭile ca me |
GR14ruphbr_u:5866: giridharaḥ spṛśati sma kadā madād duhitaraṃ duhitur mama pāmari || RBhrs_4,5.30 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5871: kuṭena māṃ tad api vañcayate vadhūṭī || RBhrs_4,5.31 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5872: asmin na tādṛśo manyau vartate raty-anugrahaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5875: krodho rati-vinābhāvān na bhakti-rasatāṃ vrajet || RBhrs_4,5.33 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5882: kṛṣṇaś ca dāruṇāś ceti tasminn ālambanā dvidhā |
GR14ruphbr_u:5883: anukampyeṣu sāgassu kṛṣṇas tasya ca bandhuṣu || RBhrs_4,6.2 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5885: darśanāc chravaṇāc ceti smaraṇāc ca prakīrtitāḥ || RBhrs_4,6.3 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5887: kiṃ śuṣyad-vadano 'pi muñca khacitaṃ citte pṛthuṃ vepathuṃ viśvasya prakṛtiṃ bhajasva na manāg apy asti mantuṃ tava |
GR14ruphbr_u:5888: uṣma-mrakṣitam ṛkṣa-rāja rabhasād vistīrya vīryaṃ tvayā pṛthvī pratyuta yuddha-kautuka-mayī sevaiva me nirmitā || RBhrs_4,6.4 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5890: mura-mathana puras te ko bhujaṅgas tapasvī laghu-haram iti kārṣīr mā sma dīnāya manyum
GR14ruphbr_u:5892: aśaraṇam atimūḍhaṃ rakṣa rakṣa prasīda || RBhrs_4,6.5 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5894: hā kiṃ karomi taralaṃ bhavanāntarāle gopendra gopaya balād uparudhya bālam |
GR14ruphbr_u:5895: kṣmā-maṇḍalena saha cañcalayan mano me śṛṅgāṇi laṅghayati paśya turaṅga-daityaḥ || RBhrs_4,6.6
GR14ruphbr_u:5897: śṛṇvantī turaga-dānavaṃ ruṣā gokulaṃ kila viśantam uddhuram |
GR14ruphbr_u:5901: virama virama mātaḥ pūtanāyāḥ prasaṅgāt tanum iyam adhunāpi smaryamāṇā dhunoti |
GR14ruphbr_u:5902: kavalayitum ivāndhīkṛtya bālaṃ ghurantī vapur atipuruṣaṃ yā ghoram āviścakāra || RBhrs_4,6.8
GR14ruphbr_u:5906: krośanādyāḥ kriyāś cātra sāttvikāś cāśru-varjitāḥ || RBhrs_4,6.10 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5909: asmin bhagna-ratiḥ sthāyī bhāvaḥ syād aparādhataḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5910: bhīṣaṇebhyaś ca tatra syād bahudhaivāparādhitā || RBhrs_4,6.12 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5911: taj-jā bhīr nāparatra syād anugrāhya-janān vinā |
GR14ruphbr_u:5912: ākṛtyā ye prakṛtyā ye ye prabhāveṇa bhīṣaṇāḥ || RBhrs_4,6.13 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5917: sadā bhagavato bhītiṃ gatā ātyantikīm api |
GR14ruphbr_u:5918: kaṃsādyā rati-śūnyatvād atra nālambanā matāḥ || RBhrs_4,6.16 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5924: asau bhakti-raso dhīrair bībhatsākhya itīryate || RBhrs_4,7.1 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5925: asminn āśrita-śāntādyā dhīrair ālambanā matāḥ || RBhrs_4,7.2 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5929: citraṃ so 'yam udīrayan hari-guṇān udbāṣpa-dṛṣṭir jano dṛṣṭe strī-vadane vikūṇita-mukho viṣṭabhya niṣṭhīvati || RBhrs_4,7.3 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5934: jugupsā-ratir atra syāt sthāyī sā ca vivekajā |
GR14ruphbr_u:5935: prāyikī ceti kathitā jugupsā dvi-vidhā budhaiḥ || RBhrs_4,7.6 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5938: vivekotthā tu dehādau jugupsā syād vivekajā || RBhrs_4,7.7 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5941: katham iha ramatāṃ budhaḥ śarīre bhagavati hanta rater lave 'py udīrṇe || RBhrs_4,7.8 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5944: yā prāyo jāyate seyaṃ jugupsā prāyikī matā || RBhrs_4,7.9 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5947: vasann eṣa klinno jaḍa-tanur ahaṃ mātur udare |
GR14ruphbr_u:5949: tad asmin kaṃsāre kuru mayi kṛpā-sāgara kṛpām || RBhrs_4,7.10 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5953: kārā-nāmani hanta māgadha-yamenāmī vayaṃ nārake kṣiptās te smṛtim ākalayya naraka-dhvaṃsinn iha prāṇimaḥ || RBhrs_4,7.11
GR14ruphbr_u:5954: labdha-kṛṣṇa-rater eva suṣṭhu pūtaṃ manaḥ sadā |
GR14ruphbr_u:5955: kṣubhyaty ahṛdy aleśe 'pi tato 'syāṃ raty-anugrahaḥ || RBhrs_4,7.12 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5957: prācāṃ matānusāreṇa tad vijñeyaṃ manīṣibhiḥ || RBhrs_4,7.13 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5958: amī pañcaiva śāntādyā harer bhakti-rasā matāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5959: eṣu hāsyādayaḥ prāyo bibhrati vyabhicāritām || RBhrs_4,7.14 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5965: mitratvaṃ śātravatvaṃ ca rasānām abhidhīyate || RBhrs_4,8.1 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5967: adbhutaś caiṣa prītādiṣu catuḥṣv api || RBhrs_4,8.2 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5968: dviṣann asya śucir yuddhavīro raudro bhayānakaḥ || RBhrs_4,8.3 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5970: vairī śucir yuddha-vīro raudraś caika-vibhāvakaḥ || RBhrs_4,8.4 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5971: preyasas tu śucir hāsyo yuddha-vīraḥ suhṛd-varāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5972: dviṣo vatsala-bībhatsa-raudrā bhīṣmaś ca pūrvavat || RBhrs_4,8.5 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5974: śatruḥ śucir yuddha-vīraḥ prīto raudraś ca pūrvavat || RBhrs_4,8.6 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5975: śucer hāsyas tathā preyān suhṛd asya prakīrtitaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5977: prāhur eke 'sya suhṛdaṃ vīra-yugmaṃ pare ripum || RBhrs_4,8.7 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5978: mitraṃ hāsyasya bībhatsaḥ śuciḥ preyān savatsalaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5979: pratipakṣas tu karuṇas tathā prokto bhayānakaḥ || RBhrs_4,8.8 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5980: adbhutasya suhṛd vīraḥ pañca śāntādayas tathā |
GR14ruphbr_u:5981: pratipakṣo bhaved asya raudro bībhatsa eva ca || RBhrs_4,8.9 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5982: vīrasya tv adbhuto hāsyaḥ preyān prītis tathā suhṛt |
GR14ruphbr_u:5983: bhayānako vipakṣo 'sya kasyacic chānta eva ca || RBhrs_4,8.10 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5985: vairī hāsyo 'sya sambhoga-śṛṅgāraś cādbhutas tathā || RBhrs_4,8.11 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5986: raudrasya karuṇaḥ prokto vīraś cāpi suhṛd-varaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5987: pratipakṣas tu hāsye 'sya śṛṅgāro bhīṣaṇo 'pi ca || RBhrs_4,8.12 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5990: bībhatsasya bhavec chānto hāsyaḥ prītis tathā suhṛt |
GR14ruphbr_u:5991: śatruḥ śucis tathā preyān jñeyā yuktyā pare ca te || RBhrs_4,8.14 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5993: kathitebhyaḥ pare ye syus te taṭasthāḥ satāṃ matāḥ || RBhrs_4,8.15 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5994: suhṛdā miśraṇāṃ samyag āsvādaṃ kurute rasam || RBhrs_4,8.16 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5995: dvayos tu miśraṇe sāmyaṃ duḥśakaṃ syāt tulā-dhṛtam |
GR14ruphbr_u:5996: tasmād aṅgāṅgi-bhāvena melanaṃ viduṣāṃ matam || RBhrs_4,8.17 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5997: bhaven mukhyo 'tha vā gauṇo raso 'ṅgī kila yatra yaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5998: kartavyaṃ tatra tasyāṅgaṃ suhṛd eva raso budhaiḥ || RBhrs_4,8.18 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6000: aṅgatāṃ yatra suhṛdo mukhyā gauṇāś ca bibhrati || RBhrs_4,8.19 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6003: tasya padāmbuja-yugalaṃ kiṃ vā saṃvāhayiṣyāmi || RBhrs_4,8.20 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6012: hitvāsmin piśitopanaddha-rudhira-klinne mudaṃ vigrahe prīty-utsikta-manāḥ kadāham asakṛd-dustarka-caryāspadam
GR14ruphbr_u:6015: atra mukhya eva mukhyasya gauṇayoś ca |
GR14ruphbr_u:6023: yas tu dṛṣṭyā padminīnām api suṣṭhu hṛṇīyate || RBhrs_4,8.24 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6027: na tṛpyati na sarvataḥ sukha-maye samādhāv api |
GR14ruphbr_u:6028: na siddhiṣu ca lālasāṃ vahati labhyamānāsv api prabho tava padārcane param upaiti tṛṣṇāṃ manaḥ atra mukhye mukhyasya gauṇayoś ca |
GR14ruphbr_u:6031: adharaṃ piñcha-cūḍasya calāś culūkayanti yāḥ || RBhrs_4,8.26 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6034: dṛśos taralitair alaṃ vraja nivṛtya mugdhe vrajaṃ vitarkayasi māṃ yathā na hi tathāsmi kiṃ bhūriṇā |
GR14ruphbr_u:6035: itīrayati mādhave nava-vilāsinīṃ chadmanā dadarśa subalo balad-vikaca-dṛṣṭir asyānanam || atra mukhye gauṇasya |
GR14ruphbr_u:6044: vatsān avati vatso me hanta santapyate manaḥ || RBhrs_4,8.29 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6047: putras te navanīta-piṇḍam atanuṃ muṣṇan mamāntar-gṛhād
GR14ruphbr_u:6049: ity uktā kula-vṛddhayā suta-mukhe dṛṣṭiṃ vibhugna-bhruṇi
GR14ruphbr_u:6050: smerāṃ nikṣipatī sadā bhavatu vaḥ kṣemāya goṣṭheśvarī || RBhrs_4,8.30 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6053: kamprā svedini cūrṇa-kuntala-taṭe sphārekṣaṇā tuṅgite savye doṣṇi vikāśi-gaṇḍa-phalakā līlāsya-bhaṅgī-śate |
GR14ruphbr_u:6057: kevale vatsale nāsti mukhyasya khalu sauhṛdam |
GR14ruphbr_u:6058: ato 'tra vatsale tasya natarāṃ likhitāṅgatā || RBhrs_4,8.32 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6060: mad-veṣa-śīlita-tanoḥ subalasya paśya vinyasya mañju-bhuja-mūrdhni bhujaṃ mukundaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6062: sandeśam arpayati tanvi mad-artham eva || RBhrs_4,8.33 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6065: svasāsmi tava nirdaye paricinoṣi na tvaṃ kutaḥ kuru praṇaya-nirbharaṃ mama kṛśāṅgi kaṇṭha-graham
GR14ruphbr_u:6066: iti bruvati peśalaṃ yuvati-veṣa-gūḍhe harau kṛtaṃ smitam abhijñayā guru-puras tadā rādhayā atra mukhye gauṇasya |
GR14ruphbr_u:6069: smara-smerām ārād dṛśam asakalām arpayati ca |
GR14ruphbr_u:6070: bhujām aṃse sakhyuḥ pulakini dadhānaḥ phani-nibhām
GR14ruphbr_u:6075: tenaiṣām aṅgitā vyaktā mukhyānāṃ ca tathāṅgatā |
GR14ruphbr_u:6076: tathāpy alpa-viśeṣāya kiñcid eva vilikhyate || RBhrs_4,8.36 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6080: adadhād vinataṃ janāgrato harir utphulla-kapolam ānanam || RBhrs_4,8.37 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6083: senānyaṃ vijitam avekṣya bhadrasenaṃ māṃ yoddhuṃ milasi puraḥ kathaṃ viśāla |
GR14ruphbr_u:6085: śrīdāmā gaṇayati re tvam atra ko 'si || RBhrs_4,8.38 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6094: yaṣṭyā durbalayā vijitya purataḥ solluṇṭham udgāyataḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6095: śrīdāmnaḥ kila vīkṣya keli-samarāṭopotsave pāṭavaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ phulla-kapolakaḥ pulakavān visphāra-dṛṣṭir babhau || RBhrs_4,8.40
GR14ruphbr_u:6097: evam anyasya gauṇasya jñeyā kavibhir aṅgitā |
GR14ruphbr_u:6098: tathā ca mukhya-gauṇānāṃ rasānām aṅgatāpi ca || RBhrs_4,8.41 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6099: so 'ṅgī sarvātigo yaḥ syān mukhyo gauṇo 'thavā rasaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6100: sa evāṅgaṃ bhaved aṅgi-poṣī sañcāritāṃ vrajan || RBhrs_4,8.42 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6102: eka eva bhavet sthāyī raso mukhyatamo hi yaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6103: rasās tad-anuyāyitvād anye syur vyabhicāriṇaḥ || RBhrs_4,8.43 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6105: rasānāṃ samavetānāṃ yasya rūpaṃ bhaved bahu |
GR14ruphbr_u:6106: sa mantavyo rasaḥ sthāyī śeṣāḥ saṅcāriṇo matāḥ || RBhrs_4,8.44 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6108: puṣṇan nija-prabhuṃ mukhyaṃ gauṇas tatraiva līyate || RBhrs_4,8.45 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6110: kuñcatā nija-nāthena gauṇo 'py aṅgitvam aśnute || RBhrs_4,8.46 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6111: mukhyas tv aṅgatvam āsādya puṣṇann indram upendravat |
GR14ruphbr_u:6114: bhāty eva na tu līnaḥ syād eṣa sañcāri-gauṇavat || RBhrs_4,8.48 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6115: aṅgī mukhyaḥ svam atrāṅgair bhāvais tair abhivardhayan |
GR14ruphbr_u:6116: sajātīyair vijātīyaiḥ svatantraḥ san virājate || RBhrs_4,8.49 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6117: yasya mukhyasya yo bhakto bhaven nitya-nijāśrayaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6118: aṅgī sa eva tatra syān mukhyo 'py anyo 'ṅgatāṃ vrajet || RBhrs_4,8.50 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6121: tad vinā tasya sampāto vaiphalyāyaiva kalpate || RBhrs_4,8.51 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6125: janayaty eva vairasyaṃ rasānāṃ vairiṇā yutiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6128: brahmiṣṭhāyā niṣphalo me vyatītaḥ kālo bhūyān hā samādhi-vratena |
GR14ruphbr_u:6129: sāndrānandaṃ tan mayā brahma mūrtaṃ koṇenākṣṇaḥ sāci-savyasya naikṣi || RBhrs_4,8.54 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6137: śiraḥ kṛṣṇa tavāghrāya vihariṣye tatas tvayā || RBhrs_4,8.56 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6139: yaṃ samasta-nigamāḥ parameśaṃ sātvatās tu bhagavantam uśanti |
GR14ruphbr_u:6140: tat suteti bata sāhasikīṃ tvāṃ vyāji-hīrṣatu kathaṃ mama jihvā || RBhrs_4,8.57 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6143: adyaiva dūti tena tvaṃ mayā ramaya mādhavam || RBhrs_4,8.58 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6145: ciraṃ jīveti saṃyujya kācid āśīrbhir acyutam |
GR14ruphbr_u:6149: kvacid bhavet tataḥ suṣṭhu vairasyāyaiva kalpate || RBhrs_4,8.60 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6157: smaryamāṇatayāpy uktau sāmyena vacane 'pi ca || RBhrs_4,8.63 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6160: ity ādiṣu na vairasyaṃ vairiṇo janayed yutiḥ || RBhrs_4,8.64 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6161: tatra ekatarasya bādhyatvena varṇane, yathā vidagdha-mādhave (2.18)--
GR14ruphbr_u:6162: pratyāhṛtya muniḥ kṣaṇaṃ viṣayato yasmin mano dhitsate bālāsau viṣayeṣu dhitsati tataḥ pratyāharantī manaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6163: yasya sphūrti-lavāya hanta hṛdaye yogī sumutkaṇṭhate mugdheyaṃ kila tasya paśya hṛdayān niṣkrāntim ākāṅkṣati || RBhrs_4,8.65 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6164: bādhyatvam atra śāntasya śucer utkarṣa-varṇanāt || RBhrs_4,8.66 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6168: phaṇīśvareṇādya vikṛṣyamāṇaḥ karoti hā naḥ paridevanāni || RBhrs_4,8.67 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6171: sukhātmā bhavatī rādhe brahma-vidyeva rājate || RBhrs_4,8.68 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6173: rādhā śāntir ivonnidraṃ nirnimeṣekṣaṇaṃ ca mām |
GR14ruphbr_u:6174: kurvatī dhyāna-lagnaṃ ca vāsayaty adri-kandare || RBhrs_4,8.69 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6176: tvaṃ kāsi śāntā kim ihāntarīkṣe draṣṭuṃ paraṃ brahma kutas tatākṣī |
GR14ruphbr_u:6177: asyātirūpāt kim ivākulātmā rambhe samāviśya bhidā smareṇa || RBhrs_4,8.70 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6183: yā te padābja-makarandam ajighratī strī || RBhrs_4,8.71 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6186: tatrāsmākaṃ yad-avadhi sakhe dṛṣṭir eṣā niviṣṭā |
GR14ruphbr_u:6187: satyaṃ brūmas tad-avadhi bhaved indum indīvaraṃ ca smāraṃ smāraṃ mukha-kuṭilatā-kāriṇīyaṃ hṛṇīyā || RBhrs_4,8.72 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6192: paśupa-savayasāṃ vapūṃṣi bhejuḥ pulaka-kulaṃ dviṣatāṃ tu kālimānam || RBhrs_4,8.73 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6195: saṅgatiḥ kila mukhyasya vairasyāyaiva jāyate || RBhrs_4,8.74 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6198: yāmi kāśya-gṛhaṃ yūnā manaḥ śyāmena me hṛtam || RBhrs_4,8.75 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6202: sadānandaṃ paraṃ brahma dṛṣṭyā seviṣyate mayā || RBhrs_4,8.76 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6208: aṅgayor aṅginaḥ puṣṭyai bhaved ekatra saṅgatiḥ || RBhrs_4,8.78 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6210: kumāras te mallī-kusuma-sukumāraḥ priyatame gariṣṭho 'yaṃ keśī girivad iti me vellati manaḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:6211: śivaṃ bhūyāt paśyonnamita-bhuja-medhir muhur amuṃ khalaṃ kṣundan kuryāṃ vrajam atitarāṃ śālinam aham || RBhrs_4,8.79 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6214: kamprā svedini cūrṇa-kuntala-taṭe ity ādi (BRS 4.8.31) || RBhrs_4,8.80 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6217: mitho vairāv api dvau yau bhāvau dharma-sutādiṣu |
GR14ruphbr_u:6218: kālādi-bhedat prākaṭyaṃ tau vindantau na duṣyataḥ || RBhrs_4,8.81 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6220: na syād ity ujjvale rādhā-kṛṣṇayor darśitaṃ purā || RBhrs_4,8.82 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6224: daityācāryās tad-āsye vikṛtim aruṇatāṃ malla-varyāḥ sakhāyo gaṇḍaunnatyaṃ khaleśāḥ pralayam ṛṣigaṇā dhyāna-muṣṇāsram ambāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6225: romāñcaṃ sāṃyugīnāḥ kam api nava-camatkāram antaḥ sureśā lāsyaṃ dāsāḥ kaṭākṣaṃ yayur asita-dṛśaḥ prekṣya raṅge mukundam ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6227: svasmin dhūrye 'py amānī śiśuṣu gari-dhṛtāv udyateṣu smitāsyas thūtkārī dadhni visre praṇayiṣu vivṛta-prauḍhir indre 'ruṇākṣaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6228: goṣṭhe sāśrur vidūne guruṣu hari-makhaṃ prāsya kampaḥ sa pāyād āsāre sphāra-dṛṣṭir yuvatiṣu pulakī bibhrad adriṃ vibhur vaḥ ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6233: rasā eva rasābhāsā rasa-jñair anukīrtitāḥ || RBhrs_4,9.1 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6234: syus tridhoparasāś cānu-rasāś cāparasāś ca te |
GR14ruphbr_u:6235: uttamā madhyamāḥ proktāḥ kaniṣṭhāś cety amī kramāt || RBhrs_4,9.2 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6238: śāntādayo rasā eva dvādaśoparasā matāḥ || RBhrs_4,9.3 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6241: tathā bībhatsa-bhūmādeḥ śānto hy uparaso bhavet || RBhrs_4,9.4 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6244: sukhaṃ dṛṣṭe tad evādya purāṇa-puruṣe tvayi || RBhrs_4,9.5 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6246: yatra yatra viṣaye mama dṛṣṭis taṃ tam eva kalayāmi bhavantam |
GR14ruphbr_u:6248: tvāṃ vinā kim api nāparam asti || RBhrs_4,9.6 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6254: praṇayan vapur vivaśatāṃ satāṃ kulair avadhīryamāṇa-naṭano 'py anargalaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6261: suhṛd ity udito bhiyā cakampe chalito narma-girā stutiṃ cakāra |
GR14ruphbr_u:6262: sa nṛpaḥ pariripsato bhujābhyāṃ hariṇā daṇḍavad agrataḥ papāta || RBhrs_4,9.10 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6267: mallānāṃ yad-avadhi parvatodbhaṭānām unmāthaṃ sapadi tavātmajād apaśyam |
GR14ruphbr_u:6272: dvayor ekatarasyaiva ratir yā khalu dṛśyate |
GR14ruphbr_u:6273: yān ekatra tathaikasya sthāyinaḥ sā virūpatā |
GR14ruphbr_u:6276: manda-smitaṃ prakṛti-siddham api vyudantaṃ saṅgopitaś ca sahajo 'pi dṛśos taraṅgaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6278: ahnāya kāpi gaitri aṅkuritām ayāsīt || RBhrs_4,9.14 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6280: etasyāḥ prāg-abhāve tu śucir noparaso bhavet || RBhrs_4,9.15 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6282: gāndharvi kurvāṇam avekṣya līlām agre dharaṇyāṃ sakhi kāma-pālam |
GR14ruphbr_u:6286: nāyikāsv apy anekāsu vadanty uparasaṃ śucim || RBhrs_4,9.17 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6289: latā-paśu-pulindīṣu vṛddhāsv api sa vartate || RBhrs_4,9.18 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6291: sakhi madhu kiratī niśamya vaṃśīṃ madhu-mathanena kaṭākṣitātha mṛdvī |
GR14ruphbr_u:6292: mukula-pulakitā latāvalīyaṃ ratim iha pallavitāṃ hṛdi vyanakti || RBhrs_4,9.19 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6300: harer dṛk-cāpalaṃ vīkṣya sahajaṃ yā vighūrṇate || RBhrs_4,9.21 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6319: kailāsa-vāsinīṃ dāsīṃ kṛpā-dṛṣṭyā bhajasva mām || RBhrs_4,9.27 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6322: kaṭī-kaṇḍūtir ity ādyaṃ grāmyatvaṃ kathitaṃ budhaiḥ || RBhrs_4,9.28 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6324: kiṃ naḥ phaṇi-kiśorīṇāṃ tvaṃ puṣkara-sadāṃ sadā |
GR14ruphbr_u:6327: prakaṭa-prārthanādiḥ syāt sambhogādes tu dhṛṣṭatā || RBhrs_4,9.30 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6330: tvaṃ vidagdho 'si govinda kiṃ vā vācyam ataḥ param || RBhrs_4,9.31 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6331: evam eva tu gauṇānāṃ hāsādīnām api svayam |
GR14ruphbr_u:6335: rasā hāsyādayaḥ sapta śāntaś cānurasā matāḥ || RBhrs_4,9.33 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6337: tāṇḍavaṃ vyadhita hanta kakkhaṭī markaṭī bhrū-kuṭībhis tathoddhuram |
GR14ruphbr_u:6344: evam evātra vijñeyā vīrāder apy udāhṛtiḥ || RBhrs_4,9.36 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6345: aṣṭāv amī taṭastheṣu prākaṭyaṃ yadi bibhrati |
GR14ruphbr_u:6349: hāsādīnāṃ tadā te 'tra prājñair aparasā matāḥ || RBhrs_4,9.38 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6352: kṛṣṇam ārāj jarāsandhaḥ solluṇṭham ahasīn muhuḥ || RBhrs_4,9.39 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6354: uttamās tu rasābhāsāḥ kaiścid rasatayoditāḥ || RBhrs_4,9.40 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6356: bhāvāḥ sarve tad-ābhāsā rasābhāsāś ca kecana |
GR14ruphbr_u:6357: amī prokta-rasābhijñaiḥ sarve 'pi rasanād rasāḥ || RBhrs_4,9.41 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6366: iti śrī-śrī-bhakti-rasāmṛta-sindhau gauṇa-bhakti-rasa-nirūpaṇo nāma caturtho vibhāgaḥ samāptaḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:6370: Thank you for using a Gaudiya Grantha Mandir text. Remember, GGM is an
GR14ruphbr_u:6372: So, give back to the world community of scholars by notifying us of any mistakes or variant readings, either by emailing us directly or by posting in the GGM forums. And if you are working closely on this or any other text, please send us your edited version.
GR14ruphbr_u:6373: And, if you can, please help by donating to the cause.
GR14ruphbr_u:6374: The work done here will last for generations.
